program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : focus on eastern germany museum takes controversial look at mundane east germany eastern germany gets pep talk on wasting money a win-win situation for american investors in east germany how the stasi rigged east german sports germany -pipe- 17.06.2006 east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the ampelmännchen has found a place in many a german heart an east german businessman on friday lost a copyright battle over the use of the former communist state 's beloved traffic light symbol , the ampelmännchen , to a souvenir entrepreneur from the west . a court in leipzig ruled that joachim rossberg 's right to use the stocky , hat-wearing ampelmännchen , or traffic-light man , as a marketing brand had largely lapsed . this was argued by lawyers for the berlin-based company ampelmännchen ltd . , which since 1997 has been doing a roaring trade in souvenirs , from t-shirts to sweets , bearing the likeness of ampelmännchen . they said the copyright had passed back into the public domain as rossberg , who lives in the eastern state of saxony , had not exercised it for five years . the court found that rossberg retains only the right to use the distinctive street-crossing symbol to market liqueur , and may no longer use it as a logo on beer and t-shirts .
he said that he would appeal the ruling . easy to read , and fun the ampelmännchen was created in 1961 by a traffic psychologist , karl peglau , when an increase in cars in the former east germany made the streets more dangerous for pedestrians . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : joachim rossberg has said he 'll appeal the ruling peglau wanted a symbol that would appeal to children and could easily be read by the elderly .
he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .
at the same time , the figure also became popular with tourists who could now freely travel to the former german democratic republic . ampelmännchen ltd was founded by markus heckhausen , a graphic designer from the western city of tübingen who moved to berlin . the court case has been seen by some as part of the cultural and political struggle between residents of the two parts of the reunified country , in which the underdog east generally loses . dw staff / afp -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de traffic-light man in tug-of-war between east and west he survived the fall of communism , but the trials and tribulations of the traffic-light man from former east germany are far from over .
-lrb- feb .
1 , 2006 -rrb- back in the gdr a prize-winning documentary project , now available as a dvd-rom , explores the history of the german democratic republic through the eyes of those who lived it .
-lrb- may 3 , 2006 -rrb- television joins the " ostalgie " bandwagon a wave of television revival shows on life in former communist east germany have hit the airwaves in germany .
critics fear they play down the repressive reality of the system .

he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .
at the same time , the figure also became popular with tourists who could now freely travel to the former german democratic republic . ampelmännchen ltd was founded by markus heckhausen , a graphic designer from the western city of tübingen who moved to berlin . the court case has been seen by some as part of the cultural and political struggle between residents of the two parts of the reunified country , in which the underdog east generally loses . dw staff / afp -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de traffic-light man in tug-of-war between east and west he survived the fall of communism , but the trials and tribulations of the traffic-light man from former east germany are far from over .

he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .

deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 12.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : cristiano ronaldo -lrb- 17 -rrb- celebrates his penalty following deco 's long distance screamer portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory . iran offered robust resistance for more than an hour before brazilian-born deco 's unstoppable opener .
cristiano ronaldo settled the matter with a penalty 10 minutes from the end . the win guarantees portugal 's progress from group d , while mexico and angola are both in contention for the other qualification spot .
it is the first time portugal has made it past the first round since 1966 , when eusebio inspired them to third place in england . after some bad-tempered exchanges , portugal 's class told in the 63rd minute . cutting in from the left , captain luis figo laid off to deco whose first-time shot sailed into the right corner , giving iran 's goalkeeper no chance . iran were not done and vahid hashemian 's powerful header forced a smart stop from ricardo . but it was all over when captain yahya golmohammadi sent his opposite number figo tumbling in the box , allowing ronaldo to step up and bury his penalty in the top right-hand corner . physical iran counter portugal 's flair with tough tackles bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the tricky ronaldo was on the end of some brutal treatment portugal were mostly on the attack throughout the game , enjoying the best of the action in an ill-tempered first period when some heavy challenges brought protests from coach luiz felipe scolari . portugal went close near half-time when miguel 's run and shot from an acute angle squirmed under goalkeeper ebrahim mirzapour and bounced across the face of goal . early on , figo picked out deco in the box but his fierce shot was palmed away .
figo also floated a free-kick to maniche but his volley from distance was headed over by the iranian defense . the trick-filled ronaldo enjoyed a busy first half , juggling the ball on the edge of the area at one point . he skimmed the outside of the post and blazed one over but cut a frustrated figure at half-time after a series of decisions went iran 's way . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the mercurial luis figo ran the game from midfield iran 's action was mainly restricted to set-pieces , although javad nekounam hit the post before being ruled offside . ronaldo continued to shine after the break , forcing a sharp save from mirzapour at his near post . pauleta tried to meet a nuno valente cross with the outside of his right boot but the flick flew over . at the other end , iran came close when a long ball found rasoul khatibi in the area but his shot went across the face of the goal . iran battled on until penalty broke resolve but portugal 's second goal broke iranian resolve and , with centre-half golmohammadi subbed off injured , they finished the match on the defensive . pauleta had a chance to increase his record goals tally in the final minutes but shot tamely , and ronaldo had a goal ruled out for offside on the whistle . portugal beat angola 1-0 in their opening game while iran went down 3-1 to mexico . portugal need only draw with mexico on wednesday to win the group . iran have now only won one world cup match in three visits , a 2-1 win over the united states in 1998 , but they have a chance to rectify that when they meet angola on wednesday . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de on track portugal meet embattled iran struggling to stay on in the tournament and missing captain and top-scorer ali daei , beleaguered iran face portugal in the group d match in frankfurt on saturday .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- portugal come out ahead of former colony on world cup pitch the score might have been higher and the quality of play better , but portugal will enjoy leaving cologne with a win and angola will be celebrated at home for holding their former rulers to one goal .
-lrb- june 11 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker .
www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .

live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 25.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action from the match with dw-world.de 's live ticker . czech starters on the bench the czech republic are facing a number of injury problems before their group e match against ghana .
striker milan baros has yet to make his 2006 world cup premier with heel problems and jan koller , who opened scoring against the us , is out with an injured hamstring .
africa 's first win ?
if ghana are able to top the czech republic it 'd be the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup .
who 's on the field ?
here 's a look at the starting line-ups : czech republic : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- petr cech ; 2- zdenek grygera , 6- marek jankulovski , 22- david rozehnal , 21- tomas ujfalusi ; 4- tomas galasek , 11- pavel nedved , 8- karel poborsky , 10- tomas rosicky , 20- jaroslav plasil ; 12- vratislav lokvenc coach : karel bruckner ghana : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 22-richard kingson ; 15-john paintsil , 13-habib mohamed , 5-john mensah , 7-shilla illiasu ; 11-sulley muntari , 8-michael essien , 10-stephen appiah , 20-otto addo ; 3-asamoah gyan 14-matthew amoah .
coach : ratomir dujkovic referee : horacio elizondo -lrb- argentina -rrb- the czech fans clearly outnumber the ghana supports in cologne - but the africans make themselves heard during the national anthem .
1. min .
the czechs get the ball rolling .
2. min .
goal ghana ! !
cech had just recovered from a corner kick when asamoah gyan hammered in a ball after ujfalusi misses a clearing header .
3. min .
celebration on the ghana bench - bruckner and the rest of the czech bench look a bit shell shocked .
4. min .
nedved wins a corner after pantsil heads a cross out .
4. min .
jankulovski takes a try from long-range but sends his shot wide of goal .
6. min .
cech sends the ball all the way down the field to kingston in the ghana posts .
7. min .
czechs get into their game after an initial shock , the czech defense has returned to its stable self with grygera distributing passes well .
9. min .
lokvenc , on for injured jan koller , tries to get around a defender , but his lob goes right into kingston 's hands .
10. min .
free kick ghana 10. min .
cech is able to handle the ball into the box without a problem .
11. min .
motivated by an early lead , ghana are pushing forward with all their might whenever they have a chance .
12. min .
rosicky passes off to nedved after beating two defenders , but the shot flies right into kingston 's hands .
14. min .
a set of fouls on both sides have taken the momentum of the match with both sides punctuating drives forward with shots that either go wide or are easily caught .
16. min .
birds of a feather ghana show an initial style similar to the czechs , staying relaxed on defense and looking for a counter opportunity .
18. min .
the ref wants a word with muntari for kicking away a ball .
no card here , just a semi-friendly warning .
19. min .
the card is for otto addo addo is booked for a tough slide tackle on the right side .
21. min .
the ref 's new whistle argentine elizondo is making sure the match does n't get out of his control and calling a close match .
23. min .
nedved and the czech republic do n't look as sure of themselves as they did against the usa .
ghana 's solid defending is keeping the europeans from getting good chances on goal .
24. min .
grygera wants to shake the game up and shoot from long range .
kingson watches the ball fly out without moving .
25. min .
poborsky presses his luck poborsky gets the ball in close the bottom of the penalty area winning some space from the defense , but ca n't beat the second defender on his dribble to the spot .
26. min .
czech republic pack own box the czechs are n't taking any risks and call back all their players to defend a corner .
28. min .
poborsky is pushed outside the ghana area - he wants a card for mensah , but only wins a free kick that does n't bring the czechs closer to goal .
30. min .
czech just wide poborsky takes a square pass from nedved and fires it wide of the far post .
31. min .
amoah misses two chances amoah was just a step behind a pass into the box , missing the volley .
his turn brings him to the center of the goal , but the right-footed shot goes high .
32. min .
cech comes up big against gyan .
gyan broke free of his defender and took the pass from appiah but fired directly into the czech goalie , who was quick off his line .
35. min .
kingson gets beat out coming out of the goal and ca n't his hands on a cross .
nedved 's resulting shot is blocked by mensah .
37. min .
nedved and essien collide near the sideline and ghana 's player is booked for going in with a high boot .
38. min .
cech collects a weak shot from amoah and quickly runs it out to the edge of the box .
he wants his team to get the lead out .
39. min .
ghana getting better of play the czechs look like they 've lost their attacking nature .
they 're running less than the africans and paying for it in shots .
either petr cech has a good eye or he was beat on a appiah shot that missed the goal by mere inches in ghana 's latest chance .
41. min .
gyan lands badly and limps off the field for treatment with only minutes until half-time .
43. min .
rosicky charges in to meet a cross from poborsky , but the volley goes wide of net in the czech 's first good chance of the last few minutes .
45 + 1. min .
czechs missing on offense injuries to baros and koller have taken the bite out of the czech attack .
poborsky and lokvenc are n't able to pick up the slack .
45 + 1. min .
ghana take lead into locker room 45 + 1. min .
the ghana defense is standing well against the czech , and much better than it did against the italians .
on offense they are also creating problems for the czech defense , which is allowing them into the penalty area where the ghanaians shots are n't as lethal as they could be .
45 + 1. min .
when it was clear koller would n't be back in time for the match with ghana , czech republic coach bruckner said the team would have to switch up it plans .
after trailing ghana for nearly all the first half , there are probably some more changes in store for the second half .
46. min .
we 're off in the second half .
46. min .
nedved hammers the ball home only to have the goal called back for offsides .
47. min .
one change each now that the action has slowed down a bit , there were two subs made before the second half kicked off .
jan polak replaced galasek for the czechs , and otto addo came off for derek boateng for ghana .
50. min .
lokvenc booked lokvenc gets his second card of the cup and will be missing during the czech republic-italy game .
the czechs will have to hope one of their other strikers is fit .
51. min .
grygera finds lokvenc on a long ball , but the cross glances of the forward 's head and sails out .
52. min .
gyan takes the ball on kick from goalie kingson , beats three defenders and nearly gets a rocket of a shot past cech , who had to use all his abilities as world goalkeeper of the year to block the shot .
54. min .
gyan is obstructed on his next break through the defense and wins a dangerous free kick .
55. min .
essien sends the ball into the wall , but ghana win it back and continue on the attack .
56. min .
czechs switch up attack poborsky replaced by jiri stajner .
57. min .
kingson saves plasil gets the ball after it floats through the penalty area , striking it on the run , his shot is pushed over the crossbar by kingson .
59. min .
jankulovski is ploughed down by cech but able to continue in the match .
61. min .
ghana are n't holding back aware of how quickly the czechs can switch from defense to dangerous , ghana continue attacking and fighting for every 50-50 ball - though the pace has slowed a bit .
65. min .
penalty ghana ! ! 67. min .
amoah was free in the box had his foot clipped by ujfalusi and elizonda calls for a penalty kick 65. min .
ujfalusi thrown out of the game he 'll miss the next game after tackling amoah .
66. min .
gyan hits the post cech went the other way , but gyan hits the post and the czechs clear .
67. min .
gyan was booked before taking the penalty kick , gyan was given a yellow card for shooting the ball into the goal out of frustration before it was given free .
68. min .
czechs make final switch pasil leaves and libor sionko comes on .
71. min .
cech saves again the czech goalie sprints out and collects the ball with a slide before amoah can add another goal to his tally .
72. min .
led by powerhouse nedved , the czechs are becoming frantic as they see the time tick away .
nedved has just sent another long cross off the field .
75. min .
the ghanaians are encamped in the czech penalty box - the defenders do n't seem interested in marking any of the men and it 's again up to cech to keep his team in the game as amoah fires at him point blank .
75. min .
derek boateng gets booked he played the ball , but rosicky takes a good fall the ref pulls out the yellow card .
76. min .
the free kick goes over the bar .
between crosses into nothingness and being called chronically offsides , the czechs are putting in a poor performance .
78. min .
essien gets free on a run into the box ; his shot does n't have much power behind it and cech clears with his right foot .
79. min .
essien sets gyan free in front of the goal after a taking a long pass but cech comes up big and manages to hold the ball between his legs .
80. min .
matthew amoah out for eric addo .
82. min .
in his first play on the ball eric addo is called for being offside .
82. min .
ghana make it two ! 83. min .
gyan beats the offside trap before passing square to muntari who , finally , hammers a ball past cech .
the keeper did n't have a chance from such close range .
84. min .
muntari booked he will also miss the third game against the usa .
86. min .
change for ghana gyan leaves for razak pimpong .
88. min .
ghana offsides essien is the most recent ghana striker to be called offsides .
the ghanaians are trying to push forward but the czech defense is pulling up in front of them .
90. min .
time is running out for the czechs - three minutes of extra time in cologne .
90 + 1. min .
kingson grabs it in contrast to other keepers up by two goals , he does n't waste any time and tosses the ball out right away .
90 + 3. min .
booking for mohamed on slide tackle from behind .
90 + 3. min .
two last saves from kingson and it 's over kingson keeps his shut-out after saving a free kick from sionko and again from polak .
90 + 3. min .
apparently demoralized after the loss to italy , ghana have returned to top form and are the first african team to claim three points in the 2006 world cup .
90 + 3. min .
group e remains wide open going into today 's final match between italy and the usa .
if the american underdogs pull out a win similar to the ghana 's here in cologne , it would leave all four teams with three points dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 24.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action from the match with dw-world.de 's live ticker . czech starters on the bench the czech republic are facing a number of injury problems before their group e match against ghana .
striker milan baros has yet to make his 2006 world cup premier with heel problems and jan koller , who opened scoring against the us , is out with an injured hamstring .
africa 's first win ?
if ghana are able to top the czech republic it 'd be the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup .
who 's on the field ?
here 's a look at the starting line-ups : czech republic : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- petr cech ; 2- zdenek grygera , 6- marek jankulovski , 22- david rozehnal , 21- tomas ujfalusi ; 4- tomas galasek , 11- pavel nedved , 8- karel poborsky , 10- tomas rosicky , 20- jaroslav plasil ; 12- vratislav lokvenc coach : karel bruckner ghana : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 22-richard kingson ; 15-john paintsil , 13-habib mohamed , 5-john mensah , 7-shilla illiasu ; 11-sulley muntari , 8-michael essien , 10-stephen appiah , 20-otto addo ; 3-asamoah gyan 14-matthew amoah .
coach : ratomir dujkovic referee : horacio elizondo -lrb- argentina -rrb- the czech fans clearly outnumber the ghana supports in cologne - but the africans make themselves heard during the national anthem .
1. min .
the czechs get the ball rolling .
2. min .
goal ghana ! !
cech had just recovered from a corner kick when asamoah gyan hammered in a ball after ujfalusi misses a clearing header .
3. min .
celebration on the ghana bench - bruckner and the rest of the czech bench look a bit shell shocked .
4. min .
nedved wins a corner after pantsil heads a cross out .
4. min .
jankulovski takes a try from long-range but sends his shot wide of goal .
6. min .
cech sends the ball all the way down the field to kingston in the ghana posts .
7. min .
czechs get into their game after an initial shock , the czech defense has returned to its stable self with grygera distributing passes well .
9. min .
lokvenc , on for injured jan koller , tries to get around a defender , but his lob goes right into kingston 's hands .
10. min .
free kick ghana 10. min .
cech is able to handle the ball into the box without a problem .
11. min .
motivated by an early lead , ghana are pushing forward with all their might whenever they have a chance .
12. min .
rosicky passes off to nedved after beating two defenders , but the shot flies right into kingston 's hands .
14. min .
a set of fouls on both sides have taken the momentum of the match with both sides punctuating drives forward with shots that either go wide or are easily caught .
16. min .
birds of a feather ghana show an initial style similar to the czechs , staying relaxed on defense and looking for a counter opportunity .
18. min .
the ref wants a word with muntari for kicking away a ball .
no card here , just a semi-friendly warning .
19. min .
the card is for otto addo addo is booked for a tough slide tackle on the right side .
21. min .
the ref 's new whistle argentine elizondo is making sure the match does n't get out of his control and calling a close match .
23. min .
nedved and the czech republic do n't look as sure of themselves as they did against the usa .
ghana 's solid defending is keeping the europeans from getting good chances on goal .
24. min .
grygera wants to shake the game up and shoot from long range .
kingson watches the ball fly out without moving .
25. min .
poborsky presses his luck poborsky gets the ball in close the bottom of the penalty area winning some space from the defense , but ca n't beat the second defender on his dribble to the spot .
26. min .
czech republic pack own box the czechs are n't taking any risks and call back all their players to defend a corner .
28. min .
poborsky is pushed outside the ghana area - he wants a card for mensah , but only wins a free kick that does n't bring the czechs closer to goal .
30. min .
czech just wide poborsky takes a square pass from nedved and fires it wide of the far post .
31. min .
amoah misses two chances amoah was just a step behind a pass into the box , missing the volley .
his turn brings him to the center of the goal , but the right-footed shot goes high .
32. min .
cech comes up big against gyan .
gyan broke free of his defender and took the pass from appiah but fired directly into the czech goalie , who was quick off his line .
35. min .
kingson gets beat out coming out of the goal and ca n't his hands on a cross .
nedved 's resulting shot is blocked by mensah .
37. min .
nedved and essien collide near the sideline and ghana 's player is booked for going in with a high boot .
38. min .
cech collects a weak shot from amoah and quickly runs it out to the edge of the box .
he wants his team to get the lead out .
39. min .
ghana getting better of play the czechs look like they 've lost their attacking nature .
they 're running less than the africans and paying for it in shots .
either petr cech has a good eye or he was beat on a appiah shot that missed the goal by mere inches in ghana 's latest chance .

gyan broke free of his defender and took the pass from appiah but fired directly into the czech goalie , who was quick off his line .
35. min .
kingson gets beat out coming out of the goal and ca n't his hands on a cross .
nedved 's resulting shot is blocked by mensah .
37. min .
nedved and essien collide near the sideline and ghana 's player is booked for going in with a high boot .
38. min .
cech collects a weak shot from amoah and quickly runs it out to the edge of the box .
he wants his team to get the lead out .
39. min .
ghana getting better of play the czechs look like they 've lost their attacking nature .
they 're running less than the africans and paying for it in shots .
either petr cech has a good eye or he was beat on a appiah shot that missed the goal by mere inches in ghana 's latest chance .
41. min .
gyan lands badly and limps off the field for treatment with only minutes until half-time .
43. min .
rosicky charges in to meet a cross from poborsky , but the volley goes wide of net in the czech 's first good chance of the last few minutes .
45 + 1. min .
czechs missing on offense injuries to baros and koller have taken the bite out of the czech attack .
poborsky and lokvenc are n't able to pick up the slack .
45 + 1. min .
ghana take lead into locker room 45 + 1. min .
the ghana defense is standing well against the czech , and much better than it did against the italians .
on offense they are also creating problems for the czech defense , which is allowing them into the penalty area where the ghanaians shots are n't as lethal as they could be .
45 + 1. min .
when it was clear koller would n't be back in time for the match with ghana , czech republic coach bruckner said the team would have to switch up it plans .
after trailing ghana for nearly all the first half , there are probably some more changes in store for the second half .
46. min .
we 're off in the second half .
46. min .
nedved hammers the ball home only to have the goal called back for offsides .
47. min .
one change each now that the action has slowed down a bit , there were two subs made before the second half kicked off .
jan polak replaced galasek for the czechs , and otto addo came off for derek boateng for ghana .
50. min .
lokvenc booked lokvenc gets his second card of the cup and will be missing during the czech republic-italy game .
the czechs will have to hope one of their other strikers is fit .
51. min .
grygera finds lokvenc on a long ball , but the cross glances of the forward 's head and sails out .
52. min .
gyan takes the ball on kick from goalie kingson , beats three defenders and nearly gets a rocket of a shot past cech , who had to use all his abilities as world goalkeeper of the year to block the shot .
54. min .
gyan is obstructed on his next break through the defense and wins a dangerous free kick .
55. min .
essien sends the ball into the wall , but ghana win it back and continue on the attack .
56. min .
czechs switch up attack poborsky replaced by jiri stajner .
57. min .
kingson saves plasil gets the ball after it floats through the penalty area , striking it on the run , his shot is pushed over the crossbar by kingson .
59. min .
jankulovski is ploughed down by cech but able to continue in the match .
61. min .
ghana are n't holding back aware of how quickly the czechs can switch from defense to dangerous , ghana continue attacking and fighting for every 50-50 ball - though the pace has slowed a bit .
65. min .
penalty ghana ! ! 67. min .
amoah was free in the box had his foot clipped by ujfalusi and elizonda calls for a penalty kick 65. min .
ujfalusi thrown out of the game he 'll miss the next game after tackling amoah .
66. min .
gyan hits the post cech went the other way , but gyan hits the post and the czechs clear .
67. min .
gyan was booked before taking the penalty kick , gyan was given a yellow card for shooting the ball into the goal out of frustration before it was given free .
68. min .
czechs make final switch pasil leaves and libor sionko comes on .
71. min .
cech saves again the czech goalie sprints out and collects the ball with a slide before amoah can add another goal to his tally .
72. min .
led by powerhouse nedved , the czechs are becoming frantic as they see the time tick away .
nedved has just sent another long cross off the field .
75. min .
the ghanaians are encamped in the czech penalty box - the defenders do n't seem interested in marking any of the men and it 's again up to cech to keep his team in the game as amoah fires at him point blank .
75. min .
derek boateng gets booked he played the ball , but rosicky takes a good fall the ref pulls out the yellow card .
76. min .
the free kick goes over the bar .
between crosses into nothingness and being called chronically offsides , the czechs are putting in a poor performance .
78. min .
essien gets free on a run into the box ; his shot does n't have much power behind it and cech clears with his right foot .
79. min .
essien sets gyan free in front of the goal after a taking a long pass but cech comes up big and manages to hold the ball between his legs .
80. min .
matthew amoah out for eric addo .
82. min .
in his first play on the ball eric addo is called for being offside .
82. min .
ghana make it two ! 83. min .
gyan beats the offside trap before passing square to muntari who , finally , hammers a ball past cech .
the keeper did n't have a chance from such close range .
84. min .
muntari booked he will also miss the third game against the usa .
86. min .
change for ghana gyan leaves for razak pimpong .
88. min .
ghana offsides essien is the most recent ghana striker to be called offsides .
the ghanaians are trying to push forward but the czech defense is pulling up in front of them .
90. min .
time is running out for the czechs - three minutes of extra time in cologne .
90 + 1. min .
kingson grabs it in contrast to other keepers up by two goals , he does n't waste any time and tosses the ball out right away .
90 + 3. min .
booking for mohamed on slide tackle from behind .
90 + 3. min .
two last saves from kingson and it 's over kingson keeps his shut-out after saving a free kick from sionko and again from polak .
90 + 3. min .
apparently demoralized after the loss to italy , ghana have returned to top form and are the first african team to claim three points in the 2006 world cup .
90 + 3. min .
group e remains wide open going into today 's final match between italy and the usa .
if the american underdogs pull out a win similar to the ghana 's here in cologne , it would leave all four teams with three points dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 24.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action from the match with dw-world.de 's live ticker . czech starters on the bench the czech republic are facing a number of injury problems before their group e match against ghana .
striker milan baros has yet to make his 2006 world cup premier with heel problems and jan koller , who opened scoring against the us , is out with an injured hamstring .
africa 's first win ?
if ghana are able to top the czech republic it 'd be the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup .
who 's on the field ?
here 's a look at the starting line-ups : czech republic : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- petr cech ; 2- zdenek grygera , 6- marek jankulovski , 22- david rozehnal , 21- tomas ujfalusi ; 4- tomas galasek , 11- pavel nedved , 8- karel poborsky , 10- tomas rosicky , 20- jaroslav plasil ; 12- vratislav lokvenc coach : karel bruckner ghana : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 22-richard kingson ; 15-john paintsil , 13-habib mohamed , 5-john mensah , 7-shilla illiasu ; 11-sulley muntari , 8-michael essien , 10-stephen appiah , 20-otto addo ; 3-asamoah gyan 14-matthew amoah .
coach : ratomir dujkovic referee : horacio elizondo -lrb- argentina -rrb- the czech fans clearly outnumber the ghana supports in cologne - but the africans make themselves heard during the national anthem .
1. min .
the czechs get the ball rolling .
2. min .
goal ghana ! !
cech had just recovered from a corner kick when asamoah gyan hammered in a ball after ujfalusi misses a clearing header .
3. min .
celebration on the ghana bench - bruckner and the rest of the czech bench look a bit shell shocked .
4. min .
nedved wins a corner after pantsil heads a cross out .
4. min .
jankulovski takes a try from long-range but sends his shot wide of goal .
6. min .
cech sends the ball all the way down the field to kingston in the ghana posts .
7. min .
czechs get into their game after an initial shock , the czech defense has returned to its stable self with grygera distributing passes well .
9. min .
lokvenc , on for injured jan koller , tries to get around a defender , but his lob goes right into kingston 's hands .
10. min .
free kick ghana 10. min .
cech is able to handle the ball into the box without a problem .
11. min .
motivated by an early lead , ghana are pushing forward with all their might whenever they have a chance .
12. min .
rosicky passes off to nedved after beating two defenders , but the shot flies right into kingston 's hands .
14. min .
a set of fouls on both sides have taken the momentum of the match with both sides punctuating drives forward with shots that either go wide or are easily caught .
16. min .
birds of a feather ghana show an initial style similar to the czechs , staying relaxed on defense and looking for a counter opportunity .
18. min .
the ref wants a word with muntari for kicking away a ball .
no card here , just a semi-friendly warning .
19. min .
the card is for otto addo addo is booked for a tough slide tackle on the right side .
21. min .
the ref 's new whistle argentine elizondo is making sure the match does n't get out of his control and calling a close match .
23. min .
nedved and the czech republic do n't look as sure of themselves as they did against the usa .
ghana 's solid defending is keeping the europeans from getting good chances on goal .
24. min .
grygera wants to shake the game up and shoot from long range .
kingson watches the ball fly out without moving .
25. min .
poborsky presses his luck poborsky gets the ball in close the bottom of the penalty area winning some space from the defense , but ca n't beat the second defender on his dribble to the spot .
26. min .
czech republic pack own box the czechs are n't taking any risks and call back all their players to defend a corner .
28. min .
poborsky is pushed outside the ghana area - he wants a card for mensah , but only wins a free kick that does n't bring the czechs closer to goal .
30. min .
czech just wide poborsky takes a square pass from nedved and fires it wide of the far post .
31. min .
amoah misses two chances amoah was just a step behind a pass into the box , missing the volley .
his turn brings him to the center of the goal , but the right-footed shot goes high .
32. min .
cech comes up big against gyan .
gyan broke free of his defender and took the pass from appiah but fired directly into the czech goalie , who was quick off his line .
35. min .
kingson gets beat out coming out of the goal and ca n't his hands on a cross .
nedved 's resulting shot is blocked by mensah .
37. min .
nedved and essien collide near the sideline and ghana 's player is booked for going in with a high boot .
38. min .
cech collects a weak shot from amoah and quickly runs it out to the edge of the box .
he wants his team to get the lead out .
39. min .
ghana getting better of play the czechs look like they 've lost their attacking nature .
they 're running less than the africans and paying for it in shots .
either petr cech has a good eye or he was beat on a appiah shot that missed the goal by mere inches in ghana 's latest chance .
41. min .
gyan lands badly and limps off the field for treatment with only minutes until half-time .
43. min .
rosicky charges in to meet a cross from poborsky , but the volley goes wide of net in the czech 's first good chance of the last few minutes .
45 + 1. min .
czechs missing on offense injuries to baros and koller have taken the bite out of the czech attack .
poborsky and lokvenc are n't able to pick up the slack .
45 + 1. min .
ghana take lead into locker room 45 + 1. min .
the ghana defense is standing well against the czech , and much better than it did against the italians .
on offense they are also creating problems for the czech defense , which is allowing them into the penalty area where the ghanaians shots are n't as lethal as they could be .
45 + 1. min .
when it was clear koller would n't be back in time for the match with ghana , czech republic coach bruckner said the team would have to switch up it plans .
after trailing ghana for nearly all the first half , there are probably some more changes in store for the second half .
46. min .
we 're off in the second half .
46. min .
nedved hammers the ball home only to have the goal called back for offsides .
47. min .
one change each now that the action has slowed down a bit , there were two subs made before the second half kicked off .
jan polak replaced galasek for the czechs , and otto addo came off for derek boateng for ghana .
50. min .
lokvenc booked lokvenc gets his second card of the cup and will be missing during the czech republic-italy game .
the czechs will have to hope one of their other strikers is fit .
51. min .
grygera finds lokvenc on a long ball , but the cross glances of the forward 's head and sails out .
52. min .
gyan takes the ball on kick from goalie kingson , beats three defenders and nearly gets a rocket of a shot past cech , who had to use all his abilities as world goalkeeper of the year to block the shot .
54. min .
gyan is obstructed on his next break through the defense and wins a dangerous free kick .
55. min .
essien sends the ball into the wall , but ghana win it back and continue on the attack .
56. min .
czechs switch up attack poborsky replaced by jiri stajner .
57. min .
kingson saves plasil gets the ball after it floats through the penalty area , striking it on the run , his shot is pushed over the crossbar by kingson .
59. min .
jankulovski is ploughed down by cech but able to continue in the match .
61. min .
ghana are n't holding back aware of how quickly the czechs can switch from defense to dangerous , ghana continue attacking and fighting for every 50-50 ball - though the pace has slowed a bit .
65. min .
penalty ghana ! ! 67. min .
amoah was free in the box had his foot clipped by ujfalusi and elizonda calls for a penalty kick 65. min .
ujfalusi thrown out of the game he 'll miss the next game after tackling amoah .
66. min .
gyan hits the post cech went the other way , but gyan hits the post and the czechs clear .
67. min .
gyan was booked before taking the penalty kick , gyan was given a yellow card for shooting the ball into the goal out of frustration before it was given free .
68. min .
czechs make final switch pasil leaves and libor sionko comes on .
71. min .
cech saves again the czech goalie sprints out and collects the ball with a slide before amoah can add another goal to his tally .
72. min .
led by powerhouse nedved , the czechs are becoming frantic as they see the time tick away .
nedved has just sent another long cross off the field .
75. min .
the ghanaians are encamped in the czech penalty box - the defenders do n't seem interested in marking any of the men and it 's again up to cech to keep his team in the game as amoah fires at him point blank .
75. min .
derek boateng gets booked he played the ball , but rosicky takes a good fall the ref pulls out the yellow card .
76. min .
the free kick goes over the bar .
between crosses into nothingness and being called chronically offsides , the czechs are putting in a poor performance .
78. min .
essien gets free on a run into the box ; his shot does n't have much power behind it and cech clears with his right foot .
79. min .
essien sets gyan free in front of the goal after a taking a long pass but cech comes up big and manages to hold the ball between his legs .

matthew amoah out for eric addo .
82. min .

82. min .

47. min .
one change each now that the action has slowed down a bit , there were two subs made before the second half kicked off .
jan polak replaced galasek for the czechs , and otto addo came off for derek boateng for ghana .
50. min .
lokvenc booked lokvenc gets his second card of the cup and will be missing during the czech republic-italy game .
the czechs will have to hope one of their other strikers is fit .
51. min .
grygera finds lokvenc on a long ball , but the cross glances of the forward 's head and sails out .
52. min .
gyan takes the ball on kick from goalie kingson , beats three defenders and nearly gets a rocket of a shot past cech , who had to use all his abilities as world goalkeeper of the year to block the shot .
54. min .
gyan is obstructed on his next break through the defense and wins a dangerous free kick .
55. min .
essien sends the ball into the wall , but ghana win it back and continue on the attack .
56. min .
czechs switch up attack poborsky replaced by jiri stajner .
57. min .
kingson saves plasil gets the ball after it floats through the penalty area , striking it on the run , his shot is pushed over the crossbar by kingson .
59. min .
jankulovski is ploughed down by cech but able to continue in the match .
61. min .
ghana are n't holding back aware of how quickly the czechs can switch from defense to dangerous , ghana continue attacking and fighting for every 50-50 ball - though the pace has slowed a bit .
65. min .
penalty ghana ! ! 67. min .
amoah was free in the box had his foot clipped by ujfalusi and elizonda calls for a penalty kick 65. min .
ujfalusi thrown out of the game he 'll miss the next game after tackling amoah .
66. min .
gyan hits the post cech went the other way , but gyan hits the post and the czechs clear .
67. min .
gyan was booked before taking the penalty kick , gyan was given a yellow card for shooting the ball into the goal out of frustration before it was given free .
68. min .
czechs make final switch pasil leaves and libor sionko comes on .
71. min .
cech saves again the czech goalie sprints out and collects the ball with a slide before amoah can add another goal to his tally .
72. min .
led by powerhouse nedved , the czechs are becoming frantic as they see the time tick away .
nedved has just sent another long cross off the field .
75. min .
the ghanaians are encamped in the czech penalty box - the defenders do n't seem interested in marking any of the men and it 's again up to cech to keep his team in the game as amoah fires at him point blank .
75. min .
derek boateng gets booked he played the ball , but rosicky takes a good fall the ref pulls out the yellow card .
76. min .
the free kick goes over the bar .
between crosses into nothingness and being called chronically offsides , the czechs are putting in a poor performance .
78. min .
essien gets free on a run into the box ; his shot does n't have much power behind it and cech clears with his right foot .
79. min .
essien sets gyan free in front of the goal after a taking a long pass but cech comes up big and manages to hold the ball between his legs .
80. min .
matthew amoah out for eric addo .
82. min .
in his first play on the ball eric addo is called for being offside .
82. min .
ghana make it two ! 83. min .
gyan beats the offside trap before passing square to muntari who , finally , hammers a ball past cech .
the keeper did n't have a chance from such close range .
84. min .
muntari booked he will also miss the third game against the usa .
86. min .
change for ghana gyan leaves for razak pimpong .
88. min .
ghana offsides essien is the most recent ghana striker to be called offsides .
the ghanaians are trying to push forward but the czech defense is pulling up in front of them .
90. min .
time is running out for the czechs - three minutes of extra time in cologne .
90 + 1. min .
kingson grabs it in contrast to other keepers up by two goals , he does n't waste any time and tosses the ball out right away .
90 + 3. min .
booking for mohamed on slide tackle from behind .
90 + 3. min .
two last saves from kingson and it 's over kingson keeps his shut-out after saving a free kick from sionko and again from polak .
90 + 3. min .
apparently demoralized after the loss to italy , ghana have returned to top form and are the first african team to claim three points in the 2006 world cup .
90 + 3. min .
group e remains wide open going into today 's final match between italy and the usa .
if the american underdogs pull out a win similar to the ghana 's here in cologne , it would leave all four teams with three points dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

ghana claims first world cup win for africa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- feedback what did you think of the game ?
send us an e-mail .

officials positive about world cup security , and fans -pipe- features -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 16.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de features -pipe- 17.06.2006 officials positive about world cup security , and fans großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : lots of excitement , few security problems at the tournament so far a senior german security official has expressed satisfaction with the first week of the world cup and forecast that the tournament will remain peaceful .
fan behavior has also come in for praise . so far , the only significant trouble came alongside wednesday 's germany-poland match in dortmund , where 430 people were detained briefly . " it shows that security forces trained just as hard for the world cup as the german national team did , " said jörg ziercke , the head of germany 's federal criminal office , was quoted as telling the daily neue osnabrücker zeitung on saturday , adding he saw no indication of a terrorist threat . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : jörg ziercke , president of germany 's federal criminal office " the police are very watchful and vigorous action is being taken consistently against troublemakers - as on wednesday in dortmund , " he added .
" i am firmly convinced that the games will remain peaceful . " alluding to possible activities by germany 's far right , ziercke said that " we will not meet with tolerance actions of intolerance against the state of law . " a string of attacks on nonwhites in the weeks before the world cup , particularly in germany 's formerly communist east , raised concerns ahead of the tournament .
it unleashed a debate about the existence of " no-go areas " in the east and some groups urged nonwhites to avoid the areas for their own safety . the debate threatened to mar the image germany hopes to project during the tournament , that of an open , tolerant and basically fun-loving society . praise for england another round of praise went to england 's fans , who are often the pariahs of international soccer due their reputation for hooliganism . this time , according to wolfgang niersbach , vice-president of the german organizing committee , the behaviour of england 's supporters has been one of the hightlights of the four-week tournament . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : english fans " by our estimates , there were 60,000 or 70,000 english fans in nuremberg for the match against trinidad & tobago and their exemplary behaviour was being discussed by many people , " he told reporters at fifa 's daily news briefing on friday . during the thursday game in nuremberg , only 26 england fans were detained by police before and after england 's 2-0 win . kevin miles , international coordinator for the -lrb- english -rrb- football supporters federation , told reuters his group has always maintained that the majority of england fans behave well for the majority of the time . " i am delighted to hear that excellent behaviour of england fans has been recognized by the authorities , " he said . niersbach also applauded the conduct of swedish fans in berlin for thursday 's match against paraguay , and the fact that many germans put on sweden 's yellow shirts in support of the scandinavians . " the atmosphere at the stadiums was incredible , " he said .
" the fans are behaving so well , long may it continue . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de international cops arrive to boost security for world cup germany has left little to chance in its preparations to host the soccer world cup .
police officers from 13 nations have arrived in the country to help identify and rein in potential troublemakers .
-lrb- june 7 , 2006 -rrb- german interior minister : " people will feel safe " in an interview with dw-tv , german interior and sports minister wolfgang schäuble said that all measures had been taken to ensure that the biggest event in germany 's modern history will be safe .
-lrb- june 3 , 2006 -rrb- hooligan violence rears its head for germany-poland game even as millions in germany celebrated their team 's hard-earned win over poland , police in dortmund , the game 's venue , had their hands full after german and polish fans clashed there .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .

" i am delighted to hear that excellent behaviour of england fans has been recognized by the authorities , " he said . niersbach also applauded the conduct of swedish fans in berlin for thursday 's match against paraguay , and the fact that many germans put on sweden 's yellow shirts in support of the scandinavians . " the atmosphere at the stadiums was incredible , " he said .
" the fans are behaving so well , long may it continue . east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol -pipe- germany -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.11.2010 home news germany german reunification europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : focus on eastern germany museum takes controversial look at mundane east germany eastern germany gets pep talk on wasting money a win-win situation for american investors in east germany how the stasi rigged east german sports germany -pipe- 17.06.2006 east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the ampelmännchen has found a place in many a german heart an east german businessman on friday lost a copyright battle over the use of the former communist state 's beloved traffic light symbol , the ampelmännchen , to a souvenir entrepreneur from the west . a court in leipzig ruled that joachim rossberg 's right to use the stocky , hat-wearing ampelmännchen , or traffic-light man , as a marketing brand had largely lapsed . this was argued by lawyers for the berlin-based company ampelmännchen ltd . , which since 1997 has been doing a roaring trade in souvenirs , from t-shirts to sweets , bearing the likeness of ampelmännchen . they said the copyright had passed back into the public domain as rossberg , who lives in the eastern state of saxony , had not exercised it for five years . the court found that rossberg retains only the right to use the distinctive street-crossing symbol to market liqueur , and may no longer use it as a logo on beer and t-shirts .
he said that he would appeal the ruling . easy to read , and fun the ampelmännchen was created in 1961 by a traffic psychologist , karl peglau , when an increase in cars in the former east germany made the streets more dangerous for pedestrians . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : joachim rossberg has said he 'll appeal the ruling peglau wanted a symbol that would appeal to children and could easily be read by the elderly .
he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .
at the same time , the figure also became popular with tourists who could now freely travel to the former german democratic republic . ampelmännchen ltd was founded by markus heckhausen , a graphic designer from the western city of tübingen who moved to berlin . the court case has been seen by some as part of the cultural and political struggle between residents of the two parts of the reunified country , in which the underdog east generally loses . dw staff / afp -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de traffic-light man in tug-of-war between east and west he survived the fall of communism , but the trials and tribulations of the traffic-light man from former east germany are far from over .
-lrb- feb .
1 , 2006 -rrb- back in the gdr a prize-winning documentary project , now available as a dvd-rom , explores the history of the german democratic republic through the eyes of those who lived it .
-lrb- may 3 , 2006 -rrb- television joins the " ostalgie " bandwagon a wave of television revival shows on life in former communist east germany have hit the airwaves in germany .
critics fear they play down the repressive reality of the system .

25 , 2003 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .

ghana reacts to first world cup win with surprise and pride -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 12.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 17.06.2006 -pipe- 20:00 utc ghana reacts to first world cup win with surprise and pride ghana erupted into one big carnival on saturday after the team 's surprise 2-0 victory over the czech republic to give africa its first victory at the world cup in germany .
cars , buses and trucks turned on their headlights and honked their horns as they sped along the streets of accra in the twilight when the final whistle blew after the vintage performance .
soccer fans , women and children seized anything they could lay their hands on to make noise as they sang the praises of the black stars .
some fans clad in the ghanaian colors of red , gold and green ran up and down the streets while others waved the national flag as they danced .
loud music resounded from drinking establishments as patrons began to party in celebration of the famous victory .
" this is phenomenal .
i could hardly believe our feat , " said kwasi fiagbedi , a lawyer .
" today we tore up the czech republic and our victory could have been bigger had the boys taken all their chances , " said henry oduro , an it specialist .
" i did not give them a chance but they played above themselves and produced the results we needed to lift ourselves up , " he added .
ghana started celebrating from the very first minute when the first goal was scored .
there were anxious moments when they threw away chance after chance , but the determination of the players gave fans hope that saturday would see ghana 's first world cup victory .
" i am delighted and i hope we can put up the same display when we play the us , " said james nelson , a soccer fan .
" the team has been improving from match to match and we pray the coach 's strategy against the us will tear that team apart as well . "
the group , which also includes italy , was left wide open after the result and will not be decided until the final games on june 22 . -lrb- dpa -rrb- dw-world.de ghana claims first world cup win for africa ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday .

for more information , please click here .
