uzbeks pedal incredible lengths to meet hero kahn -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : from europe 's heart to the center of asia " germany has done everything in its power to undermine uzbek sanctions " steinmeier : europe needs to take a closer look at central asia european union extends sanctions against uzbekistan frank walter steinmeier heads for kyrgyzstan news -pipe- 17.06.2006 uzbeks pedal incredible lengths to meet hero kahn großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : kahn might sometimes feel unloved at home , but to two uzbeks , he 's the greatest two fanatical football fans completed a remarkable 6,500 kilometers bike journey from uzbekistan to berlin to get the autograph of their hero , german goalkeeper oliver kahn . according to a report in the süddeutsche zeitung newspaper , akram marufshonow and his friend musadshon chornidow , both 58 , embarked on their journey from the uzbekistan capital tashkent on march 8 , not to see their team play - uzbekistan is not in the tournament - but to engage in a little hero worship . the autograph hunters braved rain and snow as they cycled over 4,000 miles to germany via kazakhstan , russia , belarus and poland , doing part-time jobs to pay for food . " our hands and faces were blue at times it was that cold , " akram revealed .
" but i am not leaving without kahn 's autograph . " wish fulfilled kahn , who was voted most valuable player at the 2002 world cup in japan and south korea even though he lost the top goalie spot in this tournament to jens lehmann , was amazed to hear of the young fans ' cross-continent journey in order to meet him and agreed to meet them in berlin the uzbekistan duo watched the world cup curtain-raiser between germany and costa rica on june 9 at the berlin fan mile located next to the brandenburg gate and on friday they got their wish granted . bayern munich goalkeeper kahn was pictured smiling as he signed his name to make akram and musadshon 's dreams come true . " my heart is racing i am overjoyed , " confessed akram . kahn , who turned 37 on thursday , admitted their story had touched him , saying : " i can not believe it .
it is incredible . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de beate uhse loses its world cup buzz bad news for german soccer fans : olli k. and michael b. will not be bringing pleasure to supporters during the world cup .
and as for england , their fans can forget about any buzzing performances from a certain david b.
-lrb- may 25 , 2006 -rrb- jens lehmann named german number one for world cup germany 's number one goalkeeper at the 2006 world cup will be arsenal stopper jens lehmann , it was revealed friday .
german coach jürgen klinsmann has decided to demote bayern munich 's oliver kahn to the role of deputy .
-lrb- april 7 , 2006 -rrb- kahn still worth his weight in gold to advertisers despite oliver kahn 's demotion to the national team 's reserve goalkeeper , sponsors are staying true to the 36-year old .
-lrb- april 15 , 2006 -rrb- feedback are you an oliver kahn fan ?
send us an e-mail .

east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol -pipe- germany -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 06.10.2010 home news germany german reunification europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : focus on eastern germany museum takes controversial look at mundane east germany eastern germany gets pep talk on wasting money a win-win situation for american investors in east germany how the stasi rigged east german sports germany -pipe- 17.06.2006 east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the ampelmännchen has found a place in many a german heart an east german businessman on friday lost a copyright battle over the use of the former communist state 's beloved traffic light symbol , the ampelmännchen , to a souvenir entrepreneur from the west . a court in leipzig ruled that joachim rossberg 's right to use the stocky , hat-wearing ampelmännchen , or traffic-light man , as a marketing brand had largely lapsed . this was argued by lawyers for the berlin-based company ampelmännchen ltd . , which since 1997 has been doing a roaring trade in souvenirs , from t-shirts to sweets , bearing the likeness of ampelmännchen . they said the copyright had passed back into the public domain as rossberg , who lives in the eastern state of saxony , had not exercised it for five years . the court found that rossberg retains only the right to use the distinctive street-crossing symbol to market liqueur , and may no longer use it as a logo on beer and t-shirts .
he said that he would appeal the ruling . easy to read , and fun the ampelmännchen was created in 1961 by a traffic psychologist , karl peglau , when an increase in cars in the former east germany made the streets more dangerous for pedestrians . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : joachim rossberg has said he 'll appeal the ruling peglau wanted a symbol that would appeal to children and could easily be read by the elderly .
he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .
at the same time , the figure also became popular with tourists who could now freely travel to the former german democratic republic . ampelmännchen ltd was founded by markus heckhausen , a graphic designer from the western city of tübingen who moved to berlin . the court case has been seen by some as part of the cultural and political struggle between residents of the two parts of the reunified country , in which the underdog east generally loses . dw staff / afp -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de traffic-light man in tug-of-war between east and west he survived the fall of communism , but the trials and tribulations of the traffic-light man from former east germany are far from over .
-lrb- feb .
1 , 2006 -rrb- back in the gdr a prize-winning documentary project , now available as a dvd-rom , explores the history of the german democratic republic through the eyes of those who lived it .
-lrb- may 3 , 2006 -rrb- television joins the " ostalgie " bandwagon a wave of television revival shows on life in former communist east germany have hit the airwaves in germany .
critics fear they play down the repressive reality of the system .
-lrb- aug .
25 , 2003 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : italy 1:1 usa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 25.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : italy 1:1 usa review all the action as it happened with dw-world.de 's live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker in-form italy take on the united states in the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern in the next group e game .
the group has been thrown wide open by ghana 's 2-0 win over the czech republic in cologne earlier in the day .
with the czechs , ghanians and the italians all on three points with one win each , a usa win tonight will leave the group in the balance going into the final game on thursday june 22 .
the teams : italy -lrb- 4-3-1-2 -rrb- : 1-gianluigi buffon ; 2-cristian zaccardo , 13-alessandro nesta , 5-fabio cannavaro , 19-gianluca zambrotta ; 4-daniele de rossi , 21-andrea pirlo , 20-simone perrotta ; 10-francesco totti ; 9-luca toni , 11-alberto gilardino .
united states -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 18-kasey keller ; 6-steve cherundolo , 22-oguchi onyewu , 23-eddie pope , 3-carlos bocanegra ; 8-clint dempsey , 10-claudio reyna , 4-pablo mastroeni , 15-bobby convey ; 21-landon donovan , 20-brian mcbride .
coaches make changes for this crucial game italy coach marcello lippi has brought in fit-again defender gianluca zambrotta in place of fabio grosso .
zambrotta missed the 2-0 win over ghana on monday with a thigh injury .
usa coach bruce arena has made two changes from the side which lost 3-0 to the czech republic with carlos bocanegra replacing eddie lewis at left back and clint dempsey slotting in for damarcus beasley on the right side of midfield .
usa looking to harness power of " home " crowd it 's a home game of sorts for the united states as a huge number of service personnel from the nearby us air base at rammstein and their families swell the 52,000 increased capacity at the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern .
the initimate cauldron-like stadium generates a rousing atmosphere and the two teams will feel that the crowd are right on them as the game progresses .
it is unlikely that the experienced italians will be intimidated , however .
the teams come out onto the pitch italy and the usa enter the stadium on what is a balmy summer evening in kaiserslautern .
recent scorching temperatures have dropped marginally but both teams will certainly feel the heat as the game gets underway .
both teams and sets of supporters conduct themselves well during the anthems ; although what the mother of one fan will make of her son singing the italian anthem in only his lycra boxer shorts is anyone 's guess ...
no place for the fit gennarro gattuso italian coach lippi keeps the combative midfielder from ac milan on the bench for the start although what a weapon to have in your arsenal .
we can expect to see gattuso later if things get tight for the azzurri .
1. min .
kick-off : usa gets the game started the usa gets this crucial group e game underway .
1. min .
bocanegra makes the first clearance but it 's a nervous one which gives italy a throw .
the long throw comes in and luca toni gets a glance on the ball but it goes wide .
3. min .
fabio cannavaro prowls ahead of his back four as italy look to build patiently .
the azzurri will look to break the usa down with their passing game .
4. min .
francesco totti gets the first card 4. min .
the italy striker slides in on clint dempsey and gets the yellow card for the late challenge with barely five minutes on the clock .
6. min .
the usa are giving as hard as they get and the game 's physical nature has come to the fore early as players litter the pitch after a number of fierce challenges .
7. min .
landon donovan goes down in the box as he tries to get on the end of a long cross .
the us crowd want a penalty but donovan appears to have slipped .
9. min .
the usa are growing in confidence as they increase their possession , passing their way intelligently to the edge of the italy box as they look for an opening .
11. min .
if italy are looking to hit the usa on the break they are doing everything right apart from actually getting the ball and breaking !
the whole team except toni is in the italian half waiting to break up the us attacks .
13. min .
the newly returned zambrotta shows the us what danger can come of committed too many men into attack .
he breaks dangerously but is fouled on the elft flank by steve cherundolo .
free-kick .
13. min .
the free-kick is floated in but there is a foul in the box and the ref gives the advantage to the us .
14. min .
the usa breaks and gets a dangerous free-kick right on the edge of the italian box .
15. min .
bobby convey takes the kick but it comes off the wall .
corner-kick .
the ball comes over and is hit back into the box .
convey hovers on the left and picks up the loose ball before hitting a rising shot well over the bar .
a good chance for the us .
18. min .
a great move from the usa carves open the italian defense .
eight passes end in clint dempsey fooling fabio cannavaro and hitting a shot on the turn .
the ball skims just wide of buffon 's goal .
20. min .
eddie pope gets the next card the us defender is the last man as the long ball out of defense comes over .
he has no other choice but to haul down gilardino and is lucky just to get a yellow .
21. min .
goal italy 22. min .
gilardino dives in at the near post to head in italy filled the box waiting for the free-kick but the ball came in early and the milan striker gilardino dived in front of everyone to arrow an unstoppable low header past kasey keller .
you 'd have to say the goal comes against the run of play .
24. min .
the usa will have to show character now .
when they went behind to the czech republic , they had no reply and were taken apart at will .
the italians will be just as ruthless given the chance .
26. min .
goal usa 27. min .
cristian zaccardo scores a bizzare own goal !
the italian defender goes to sweep away the deep cross from convey but he misses the ball completely and diverts the ball past buffon with his standing leg .
28. min .
de rossi gets a straight red ! !
daniele de rossi sees red for a blatant and vicious elbow which leaves brian mcbride with a face covered in blood .
31. min .
with the blood levels up and the pace incessant , luca toni breaks on the left and whips a cross-shot past kasey keller but also past the far post .
32. min .
the usa break and brian mcbride , patched up and back on , is outjumped as the cross comes in .
corner usa .
the ball comes in and dempsey connects well but his header is way over .
35. min .
gattuso comes on for totti gennarro gattuso comes on to shore up the italian midfield .
totti makes way for the milan enforcer .
36. min .
disallowed goal for italy gattuso makes an immediate impression by putting the ball in the net with an exquisite chip but luca toni , not interfering with play and returning from an offside position , is deemed to be offside .
the goal , which looks good in the replays , does n't stand .
40. min .
italy look to soak up pressure and hit gilardino with long balls over the already cautioned eddie pope .
the us look to exploit the sending off of de rossi by piling forward in numbers , swamping the retreating defense .
42. min .
bocanegra shoots !
a great long distance effort from carlos bocanegra dips just over the bar and ends up in the top netting .
it would have been a peach of a goal to take the lead with just before half-time .
43. min .
claudio reyna is the next us player to go close but his shot is deflected behind for a corner .
45. min .
pablo mastroeni gets a straight red !
the us defender is the next one heading for an early bath after a late challenge which completely missed the ball but took andrea pirlo 's ankle .
it 's now ten versus ten .
45 + 3. min .
half-time : a goal apiece ; a red card apiece the us and italy come off the pitch after an incident packed first-half .
45. min .
second-half : the match restarts italy kick-off the second-half .
46. min .
eddie pope gets his second yellow !
the second-half starts in the worst possible way as eddie pope gets his second yellow for a tackle from behind on gilardino .
48. min .
it looks as though both teams failed to cool down at half-time .
the tackles are wild , the atmosphere malevolent and the game is on the brink of boiling over completely .
50. min .
bobby convey comes off ; jimmy conrad on the us make a substitution and directly after carlos bocanegra slams a header against the italian bar ! 53. min .
zaccardo comes off for alessandro del piero the own-goal scorer comes off for the golden boy of italian soccer .
can del piero win the day for ten-man italy over nine-man usa ? 57. min .
claudio reyna advances with menace towards the italy goal with dfeneders backing off .
the us captain has time to get closer but chooses to stab a weak shot at goal from distance which barely makes it to the touchline .
60. min .
dempsey claims zambrotta handles in the area but the claims for a penalty are half-hearted and the ref waves play on .
61. min .
luca toni comes off for iaquinta marcello lippi tries to inject some life into his attack by taking off the ineffective toni .
62. min .
damarcus beasley comes on for clint dempsey 63. min .
mcbride goes close !
brian mcbride steams through onto a great ball from landon donovon but rifles his shot wide of the post with buffon beaten .
64. min .
disallowed goal for united states the referee calls the usa 's second goal offside and kaiserslautern erupts into whistles !
the replays show that mcbride is offside when he back heels the ball past buffon .
67. min .
zambrotta goes close with a wicked curling shot from the edge of the area .
the midfielder drifts past onyewu and curls a fast shot past kasey keller but just past the post as well .
70. min .
zambrotta is the next in the ref 's book the italian forgets that you change shirts at the end of the game as he tustles with landon donovan .
he ends the tugging of the us star 's shirt with a fine shove in the back which earns him a booking .
73. min .
del piero gets on the end of a perfectly weighted chip pass from pirlo to volley goalwards but keller is acrobatic in the save and usa survive a real scare .
78. min .
steve cherundolo beats his man on the right flank with skill and pace before getting a great cross in but brian mcbride is too late in the take-off and heads wide .
79. min .
kasey keller again makes a flying save , this time from andrea pirlo .
the us keeper is earning his corn tonight .
83. min .
the us have people queuing up to take a shot at buffon 's goal but they seem content with the draw .
what other reason could there be for the lack of incisive passes and running when the goal is at their mercy ? 84. min .
pirlo threads the most precise of passes through the us defense to iaquinta who does n't realize he has so much time .
he is alone but pokes a tame shot straight at keller .
87. min .
a great team move involving del piero , pirlo and iaquinta carves open the us defense but when the ball is whipped into the crowded box there is n't an adequate italian boot to apply the finishing touch .
89. min .
gilardino gets on the end of a deep cross but his header flies well wide , much to his frustration .
90 + 2. min .
full-time : a pulsating but bad tempered 1-1 draw the us and italy are deadlocked at the end but this has been no boring drawn match .
both sides gave everything and sacrificed men in the pursuit of the win .
group e remains an interesting prospect : italy have four points , ghana and the czech republic three and the us have one .
no-one is guaranteed a place in the last 16 just yet . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : italy 1:1 usa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : italy 1:1 usa review all the action as it happened with dw-world.de 's live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker in-form italy take on the united states in the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern in the next group e game .
the group has been thrown wide open by ghana 's 2-0 win over the czech republic in cologne earlier in the day .
with the czechs , ghanians and the italians all on three points with one win each , a usa win tonight will leave the group in the balance going into the final game on thursday june 22 .
the teams : italy -lrb- 4-3-1-2 -rrb- : 1-gianluigi buffon ; 2-cristian zaccardo , 13-alessandro nesta , 5-fabio cannavaro , 19-gianluca zambrotta ; 4-daniele de rossi , 21-andrea pirlo , 20-simone perrotta ; 10-francesco totti ; 9-luca toni , 11-alberto gilardino .
united states -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 18-kasey keller ; 6-steve cherundolo , 22-oguchi onyewu , 23-eddie pope , 3-carlos bocanegra ; 8-clint dempsey , 10-claudio reyna , 4-pablo mastroeni , 15-bobby convey ; 21-landon donovan , 20-brian mcbride .
coaches make changes for this crucial game italy coach marcello lippi has brought in fit-again defender gianluca zambrotta in place of fabio grosso .
zambrotta missed the 2-0 win over ghana on monday with a thigh injury .
usa coach bruce arena has made two changes from the side which lost 3-0 to the czech republic with carlos bocanegra replacing eddie lewis at left back and clint dempsey slotting in for damarcus beasley on the right side of midfield .
usa looking to harness power of " home " crowd it 's a home game of sorts for the united states as a huge number of service personnel from the nearby us air base at rammstein and their families swell the 52,000 increased capacity at the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern .
the initimate cauldron-like stadium generates a rousing atmosphere and the two teams will feel that the crowd are right on them as the game progresses .
it is unlikely that the experienced italians will be intimidated , however .
the teams come out onto the pitch italy and the usa enter the stadium on what is a balmy summer evening in kaiserslautern .
recent scorching temperatures have dropped marginally but both teams will certainly feel the heat as the game gets underway .
both teams and sets of supporters conduct themselves well during the anthems ; although what the mother of one fan will make of her son singing the italian anthem in only his lycra boxer shorts is anyone 's guess ...
no place for the fit gennarro gattuso italian coach lippi keeps the combative midfielder from ac milan on the bench for the start although what a weapon to have in your arsenal .
we can expect to see gattuso later if things get tight for the azzurri .
1. min .
kick-off : usa gets the game started the usa gets this crucial group e game underway .
1. min .
bocanegra makes the first clearance but it 's a nervous one which gives italy a throw .
the long throw comes in and luca toni gets a glance on the ball but it goes wide .
3. min .
fabio cannavaro prowls ahead of his back four as italy look to build patiently .
the azzurri will look to break the usa down with their passing game .
4. min .
francesco totti gets the first card 4. min .
the italy striker slides in on clint dempsey and gets the yellow card for the late challenge with barely five minutes on the clock .
6. min .
the usa are giving as hard as they get and the game 's physical nature has come to the fore early as players litter the pitch after a number of fierce challenges .
7. min .
landon donovan goes down in the box as he tries to get on the end of a long cross .
the us crowd want a penalty but donovan appears to have slipped .
9. min .
the usa are growing in confidence as they increase their possession , passing their way intelligently to the edge of the italy box as they look for an opening .
11. min .
if italy are looking to hit the usa on the break they are doing everything right apart from actually getting the ball and breaking !
the whole team except toni is in the italian half waiting to break up the us attacks .
13. min .
the newly returned zambrotta shows the us what danger can come of committed too many men into attack .
he breaks dangerously but is fouled on the elft flank by steve cherundolo .
free-kick .
13. min .
the free-kick is floated in but there is a foul in the box and the ref gives the advantage to the us .
14. min .
the usa breaks and gets a dangerous free-kick right on the edge of the italian box .
15. min .
bobby convey takes the kick but it comes off the wall .
corner-kick .
the ball comes over and is hit back into the box .
convey hovers on the left and picks up the loose ball before hitting a rising shot well over the bar .
a good chance for the us .
18. min .
a great move from the usa carves open the italian defense .
eight passes end in clint dempsey fooling fabio cannavaro and hitting a shot on the turn .
the ball skims just wide of buffon 's goal .
20. min .
eddie pope gets the next card the us defender is the last man as the long ball out of defense comes over .
he has no other choice but to haul down gilardino and is lucky just to get a yellow .
21. min .
goal italy 22. min .
gilardino dives in at the near post to head in italy filled the box waiting for the free-kick but the ball came in early and the milan striker gilardino dived in front of everyone to arrow an unstoppable low header past kasey keller .
you 'd have to say the goal comes against the run of play .
24. min .
the usa will have to show character now .
when they went behind to the czech republic , they had no reply and were taken apart at will .
the italians will be just as ruthless given the chance .
26. min .
goal usa 27. min .
cristian zaccardo scores a bizzare own goal !
the italian defender goes to sweep away the deep cross from convey but he misses the ball completely and diverts the ball past buffon with his standing leg .
28. min .
de rossi gets a straight red ! !
daniele de rossi sees red for a blatant and vicious elbow which leaves brian mcbride with a face covered in blood .
31. min .
with the blood levels up and the pace incessant , luca toni breaks on the left and whips a cross-shot past kasey keller but also past the far post .
32. min .
the usa break and brian mcbride , patched up and back on , is outjumped as the cross comes in .
corner usa .
the ball comes in and dempsey connects well but his header is way over .
35. min .
gattuso comes on for totti gennarro gattuso comes on to shore up the italian midfield .
totti makes way for the milan enforcer .
36. min .
disallowed goal for italy gattuso makes an immediate impression by putting the ball in the net with an exquisite chip but luca toni , not interfering with play and returning from an offside position , is deemed to be offside .
the goal , which looks good in the replays , does n't stand .
40. min .
italy look to soak up pressure and hit gilardino with long balls over the already cautioned eddie pope .
the us look to exploit the sending off of de rossi by piling forward in numbers , swamping the retreating defense .
42. min .
bocanegra shoots !
a great long distance effort from carlos bocanegra dips just over the bar and ends up in the top netting .
it would have been a peach of a goal to take the lead with just before half-time .
43. min .
claudio reyna is the next us player to go close but his shot is deflected behind for a corner .
45. min .
pablo mastroeni gets a straight red !
the us defender is the next one heading for an early bath after a late challenge which completely missed the ball but took andrea pirlo 's ankle .
it 's now ten versus ten .
45 + 3. min .
half-time : a goal apiece ; a red card apiece the us and italy come off the pitch after an incident packed first-half .
45. min .
second-half : the match restarts italy kick-off the second-half .
46. min .
eddie pope gets his second yellow !
the second-half starts in the worst possible way as eddie pope gets his second yellow for a tackle from behind on gilardino .
48. min .
it looks as though both teams failed to cool down at half-time .
the tackles are wild , the atmosphere malevolent and the game is on the brink of boiling over completely .
50. min .
bobby convey comes off ; jimmy conrad on the us make a substitution and directly after carlos bocanegra slams a header against the italian bar ! 53. min .
zaccardo comes off for alessandro del piero the own-goal scorer comes off for the golden boy of italian soccer .
can del piero win the day for ten-man italy over nine-man usa ? 57. min .
claudio reyna advances with menace towards the italy goal with dfeneders backing off .
the us captain has time to get closer but chooses to stab a weak shot at goal from distance which barely makes it to the touchline .
60. min .

62. min .
damarcus beasley comes on for clint dempsey 63. min .
mcbride goes close !
brian mcbride steams through onto a great ball from landon donovon but rifles his shot wide of the post with buffon beaten .
64. min .
disallowed goal for united states the referee calls the usa 's second goal offside and kaiserslautern erupts into whistles !
the replays show that mcbride is offside when he back heels the ball past buffon .
67. min .
zambrotta goes close with a wicked curling shot from the edge of the area .
the midfielder drifts past onyewu and curls a fast shot past kasey keller but just past the post as well .
70. min .
zambrotta is the next in the ref 's book the italian forgets that you change shirts at the end of the game as he tustles with landon donovan .
he ends the tugging of the us star 's shirt with a fine shove in the back which earns him a booking .
73. min .
del piero gets on the end of a perfectly weighted chip pass from pirlo to volley goalwards but keller is acrobatic in the save and usa survive a real scare .
78. min .
steve cherundolo beats his man on the right flank with skill and pace before getting a great cross in but brian mcbride is too late in the take-off and heads wide .
79. min .
kasey keller again makes a flying save , this time from andrea pirlo .
the us keeper is earning his corn tonight .
83. min .
the us have people queuing up to take a shot at buffon 's goal but they seem content with the draw .
what other reason could there be for the lack of incisive passes and running when the goal is at their mercy ? 84. min .
pirlo threads the most precise of passes through the us defense to iaquinta who does n't realize he has so much time .
he is alone but pokes a tame shot straight at keller .
87. min .
a great team move involving del piero , pirlo and iaquinta carves open the us defense but when the ball is whipped into the crowded box there is n't an adequate italian boot to apply the finishing touch .
89. min .
gilardino gets on the end of a deep cross but his header flies well wide , much to his frustration .
90 + 2. min .
full-time : a pulsating but bad tempered 1-1 draw the us and italy are deadlocked at the end but this has been no boring drawn match .
both sides gave everything and sacrificed men in the pursuit of the win .
group e remains an interesting prospect : italy have four points , ghana and the czech republic three and the us have one .

live ticker : italy 1:1 usa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : italy 1:1 usa review all the action as it happened with dw-world.de 's live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker in-form italy take on the united states in the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern in the next group e game .

corner-kick .
the ball comes over and is hit back into the box .

a good chance for the us .
18. min .
a great move from the usa carves open the italian defense .
eight passes end in clint dempsey fooling fabio cannavaro and hitting a shot on the turn .
the ball skims just wide of buffon 's goal .
20. min .
eddie pope gets the next card the us defender is the last man as the long ball out of defense comes over .
he has no other choice but to haul down gilardino and is lucky just to get a yellow .
21. min .
goal italy 22. min .
gilardino dives in at the near post to head in italy filled the box waiting for the free-kick but the ball came in early and the milan striker gilardino dived in front of everyone to arrow an unstoppable low header past kasey keller .
you 'd have to say the goal comes against the run of play .
24. min .
the usa will have to show character now .
when they went behind to the czech republic , they had no reply and were taken apart at will .
the italians will be just as ruthless given the chance .
26. min .
goal usa 27. min .
cristian zaccardo scores a bizzare own goal !
the italian defender goes to sweep away the deep cross from convey but he misses the ball completely and diverts the ball past buffon with his standing leg .
28. min .
de rossi gets a straight red ! !
daniele de rossi sees red for a blatant and vicious elbow which leaves brian mcbride with a face covered in blood .
31. min .
with the blood levels up and the pace incessant , luca toni breaks on the left and whips a cross-shot past kasey keller but also past the far post .
32. min .
the usa break and brian mcbride , patched up and back on , is outjumped as the cross comes in .
corner usa .
the ball comes in and dempsey connects well but his header is way over .
35. min .
gattuso comes on for totti gennarro gattuso comes on to shore up the italian midfield .
totti makes way for the milan enforcer .
36. min .
disallowed goal for italy gattuso makes an immediate impression by putting the ball in the net with an exquisite chip but luca toni , not interfering with play and returning from an offside position , is deemed to be offside .
the goal , which looks good in the replays , does n't stand .
40. min .
italy look to soak up pressure and hit gilardino with long balls over the already cautioned eddie pope .
the us look to exploit the sending off of de rossi by piling forward in numbers , swamping the retreating defense .
42. min .
bocanegra shoots !
a great long distance effort from carlos bocanegra dips just over the bar and ends up in the top netting .
it would have been a peach of a goal to take the lead with just before half-time .
43. min .
claudio reyna is the next us player to go close but his shot is deflected behind for a corner .
45. min .
pablo mastroeni gets a straight red !
the us defender is the next one heading for an early bath after a late challenge which completely missed the ball but took andrea pirlo 's ankle .
it 's now ten versus ten .
45 + 3. min .
half-time : a goal apiece ; a red card apiece the us and italy come off the pitch after an incident packed first-half .
45. min .
second-half : the match restarts italy kick-off the second-half .
46. min .
eddie pope gets his second yellow !
the second-half starts in the worst possible way as eddie pope gets his second yellow for a tackle from behind on gilardino .
48. min .
it looks as though both teams failed to cool down at half-time .
the tackles are wild , the atmosphere malevolent and the game is on the brink of boiling over completely .
50. min .
bobby convey comes off ; jimmy conrad on the us make a substitution and directly after carlos bocanegra slams a header against the italian bar ! 53. min .
zaccardo comes off for alessandro del piero the own-goal scorer comes off for the golden boy of italian soccer .
can del piero win the day for ten-man italy over nine-man usa ? 57. min .
claudio reyna advances with menace towards the italy goal with dfeneders backing off .
the us captain has time to get closer but chooses to stab a weak shot at goal from distance which barely makes it to the touchline .
60. min .
dempsey claims zambrotta handles in the area but the claims for a penalty are half-hearted and the ref waves play on .
61. min .
luca toni comes off for iaquinta marcello lippi tries to inject some life into his attack by taking off the ineffective toni .
62. min .
damarcus beasley comes on for clint dempsey 63. min .
mcbride goes close !
brian mcbride steams through onto a great ball from landon donovon but rifles his shot wide of the post with buffon beaten .
64. min .
disallowed goal for united states the referee calls the usa 's second goal offside and kaiserslautern erupts into whistles !
the replays show that mcbride is offside when he back heels the ball past buffon .
67. min .
zambrotta goes close with a wicked curling shot from the edge of the area .
the midfielder drifts past onyewu and curls a fast shot past kasey keller but just past the post as well .
70. min .
zambrotta is the next in the ref 's book the italian forgets that you change shirts at the end of the game as he tustles with landon donovan .
he ends the tugging of the us star 's shirt with a fine shove in the back which earns him a booking .
73. min .
del piero gets on the end of a perfectly weighted chip pass from pirlo to volley goalwards but keller is acrobatic in the save and usa survive a real scare .
78. min .
steve cherundolo beats his man on the right flank with skill and pace before getting a great cross in but brian mcbride is too late in the take-off and heads wide .
79. min .
kasey keller again makes a flying save , this time from andrea pirlo .
the us keeper is earning his corn tonight .
83. min .
the us have people queuing up to take a shot at buffon 's goal but they seem content with the draw .
what other reason could there be for the lack of incisive passes and running when the goal is at their mercy ? 84. min .
pirlo threads the most precise of passes through the us defense to iaquinta who does n't realize he has so much time .
he is alone but pokes a tame shot straight at keller .
87. min .
a great team move involving del piero , pirlo and iaquinta carves open the us defense but when the ball is whipped into the crowded box there is n't an adequate italian boot to apply the finishing touch .
89. min .
gilardino gets on the end of a deep cross but his header flies well wide , much to his frustration .
90 + 2. min .
full-time : a pulsating but bad tempered 1-1 draw the us and italy are deadlocked at the end but this has been no boring drawn match .
both sides gave everything and sacrificed men in the pursuit of the win .
group e remains an interesting prospect : italy have four points , ghana and the czech republic three and the us have one .
no-one is guaranteed a place in the last 16 just yet . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

fifa official caught selling world cup tickets -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 11.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 17.06.2006 -pipe- 20:00 utc fifa official caught selling world cup tickets a member of fifa 's executive committee was caught selling world cup match tickets for three times their value and ordered home from the tournament as a result .
ismail bhamjee of botswana was uncovered through a sting operation by the " english mail on sunday " newspaper , which then produced the evidence to soccer 's ruling body .
bhamjee confirmed in a written statement that he sold 12 category one tickets for the match between england and trinidad & tobago for 300 euros each , 200 euros above face value .
" i deeply regret this incorrect act and apologize to fifa for violating the relevant terms and conditions governing the sale of tickets for the 2006 fifa world cup , " he said in a statement .
fifa have since ordered bhamjee to resign from his world cup- related duties and leave germany at the earliest opportunity .
bhamjee has been a fifa executive committee member since 1998 and serves as the deputy chairman of the associations committee and on the financial committee .
he is the president of the botswana football association and serves on the executive committee of africa 's controlling body , caf .
" i am very disappointed about the conduct of a member of the fifa executive committee .
in such a situation , fifa acts immediately and firmly , " said fifa president joseph blatter . dw-world.de fans storm world cup ticket centers ticket centers have opened at some of the 12 world cup stadiums so that fans can pick up the coveted entry passes they were allotted .
some ticketless fans got lucky by going directly to the venues .

if you are inside the united states , it is still possible for you to enjoy dw-tv .
for more information , please click here .

fifa official caught selling world cup tickets -pipe- world cup 2006 -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup 2006 -pipe- 17.06.2006 -pipe- 20:00 utc fifa official caught selling world cup tickets a member of fifa 's executive committee was caught selling world cup match tickets for three times their value and ordered home from the tournament as a result .
ismail bhamjee of botswana was uncovered through a sting operation by the " english mail on sunday " newspaper , which then produced the evidence to soccer 's ruling body .
bhamjee confirmed in a written statement that he sold 12 category one tickets for the match between england and trinidad & tobago for 300 euros each , 200 euros above face value .
" i deeply regret this incorrect act and apologize to fifa for violating the relevant terms and conditions governing the sale of tickets for the 2006 fifa world cup , " he said in a statement .
fifa have since ordered bhamjee to resign from his world cup- related duties and leave germany at the earliest opportunity .
bhamjee has been a fifa executive committee member since 1998 and serves as the deputy chairman of the associations committee and on the financial committee .
he is the president of the botswana football association and serves on the executive committee of africa 's controlling body , caf .
" i am very disappointed about the conduct of a member of the fifa executive committee .
in such a situation , fifa acts immediately and firmly , " said fifa president joseph blatter . dw-world.de fans storm world cup ticket centers ticket centers have opened at some of the 12 world cup stadiums so that fans can pick up the coveted entry passes they were allotted .
some ticketless fans got lucky by going directly to the venues .
-lrb- june 1 , 2006 -rrb- more briefs 16.06.2006 -pipe- england offered caribbean island trip for world cup win 16.06.2006 -pipe- tantalizing treat for south koreans if they reach second stage 14.06.2006 -pipe- world cup pitch triggers litany of complaints 13.06.2006 -pipe- despite heat , frankfurt stadium roof to be closed 12.06.2006 -pipe- togo 's german coach decides to stay after all 09.06.2006 -pipe- ronaldo irked by president lula 's weight comments 09.06.2006 -pipe- germany defends decision to give iranian vice-president visa 09.06.2006 -pipe- german court clears far-right march gallery the world cup in pictures standings world cup rankings keep track of the latest results and rankings with dw-world.de 's score board .
the best of germany germany has much that is worth celebrating .
here dw-world presents 100 reasons to love germany .
germany 's train stations play the game join in the world cup fun with dw 's interactive sites .
shoot a goal predict the winners visit germany exploring deutschland check out dw-world 's section with tips and reports from all parts of the country .
readers ' corner germany 's defeat dw-world.de readers were crushed by germany 's defeat in the world cup but saw a silver lining . © dw 2010 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 11.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : the road to the final two late extra-time goals kill off germany 's world cup dream zidane 's penalty decides nervous semi as france make final italy make light work of ukraine to meet hosts in semi-finals us out of world cup while ghana , italy reach next round match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : no quarter : both italy and the united states gave everything in the battle of nuremberg in terms of goals , italy and the us canceled each other out .
in terms of sendings-off ; italy won , having only one man dismissed to usa 's two .
in between the goals and the cards , everything else possible happened . italy were held to a 1-1 draw by the usa in a bad-tempered world cup clash here saturday in which three players were sent off . the result means that all four teams in group e , which also includes ghana and the czech republic , still have a chance of making the last 16 . alberto gilardino gave italy the lead with a diving header , but an own goal by cristian zaccardo brought the usa back on level terms . us striker eddie johnson had caused a rumpus earlier in the week by comparing the world cup to war .
it was n't warfare , but this gripping contest was far from friendly . three-time world champions italy had daniele de rossi sent off in the 28th minute for elbowing brian mcbride and the usa 's pablo mastroeni shortly followed him down the tunnel for clattering into andrea pirlo . the americans were then reduced to nine men a minute after half time when eddie pope picked up his second yellow card .
it was only the fourth time in the history of the world cup that three players had been sent off in the same match . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pope 's second yellow meant usa finished with nine men kasey keller pulled off two excellent saves to deny italy substitute alessandro del piero in the closing stages as the usa bravely dug in to snatch a point . the result leaves the group wide open going into the final first round match with italy on four points , followed by the czech republic and ghana both on three and the usa on one . italy next face the czech republic in hamburg next thursday , while the usa take on ghana in nuremberg the same day . the americans , quarter-finalists four years ago , made life difficult for the italians in the first quarter of an hour , snapping into tackles and creating two half chances which bobby convey and dempsey wasted . italy absorbed the pressure and took the lead in the 22nd minute after pope 's foul on luca toni wide on the right . pirlo delivered a low centre into the box and gilardino stooped to steer the ball past a helpless keller with his forehead . italy 's joy lasted just five minutes with a defensive howler gifting the usa an equalizer . zaccardo swung a boot out wildly to try and clear convey 's crossed free-kick and succeeded only in diverting the ball past his own keeper , gianluigi buffon . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : brian mcbride recovered to threaten for the us in attack worse was to follow seconds later as de rossi was rightly sent off for elbowing mcbride in the face .
mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : italy 1:1 usa www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback who do you think will progress from group e ?
please include your full name and country with any reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .
klinsmann springs surprises in naming world cup squad germany world cup squad stadiums check out the 12 venues for the 2006 world cup .
world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .

mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .

mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : italy 1:1 usa www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback who do you think will progress from group e ?
please include your full name and country with any reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 29.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker . what 's riding on the game ?
like all the second group games between winners - portugal beat angola 1-0 , and losers iran lost to 3-1 to mexico in their first group d games - a win for portugal would mean a sure spot in the round of 16 and three points are essential for iran to avoid an early trip home .
starting line-up announced here 's how the coaches will send out the teams : portugal : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- ricardo ; 13- miguel , 16- ricardo carvalho , 5- fernando meira , 14- nuno valente ; 20- deco , 6- costinha , 18- maniche , 7- luis figo -lrb- captain -rrb- , 17- cristiano ronaldo ; 9- pauleta coach : luiz felipe scolari iran : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1- ebrahim mirzapour ; 13- hossein kaabi , 5- rahman rezaei , 4- yahya golmohammadi -lrb- captain -rrb- , 20- mohammad nosrati ; 2- mehdi mahdavikia , 6- javad nekounam , 8- ali karimi , 14- andranik teymourian ; 21- mehrzad madanchi , 9- vahid hashemian coach : branko ivankovic referee : eric poulat -lrb- france -rrb- deco makes his debut in the 2006 world cup .
look for the portuguese playmaker to add to the team 's creativity in the middle of the field .
conditions cooling down the thermometer reads a comfortable 25 degrees celsius -lrb- 77 f -rrb- as the national anthems are played in frankfurt .
1. min .
iran kick the game off french referee eric poulat blows the whistle and we 're underway .
2. min .
figo sends in a great pass from the bottom corner of the penalty area to deco , but the center ca n't get it under control before being swarmed by iranian defenders .
3. min .
portugal control the ball with imprecise passes that iran are n't trying to cut off .
5. min .
deco changes his shoes just minutes into the match , deco realizes he wants a different pair of cleats on the frankfurt pitch .
players have complained of slippery grass and have lost their footing several times already during the tournament .
8. min .
portugal are moving well up the flanks but ca n't manage to center the ball .
iran give up a corner .
8. min .
figo sends the ball out to maniche ; his long-distance shot sails wide .
10. min .
moving on up miguel dribbles into the penalty box after taking a long run from his defensive position ; his shot is blocked by rezaei 's shin .
11. min .
iran get their first counter attack chance of the match ; they are caught up in midfield giving the portuguese midfielders time to get back .
12. min .
nekounam heads past the goal on an iran free kick .
the pace of the game is picking up .
13. min .
deco fires a left footer from 10 meters out but keeper mirzapour is just able to get his right hand on the ball to swat it over the crossbar .
15. min .
madanchi gets a long ball from midfield and beats the offside trap but ca n't get a foot on the bouncing ball , giving up an excellent chance on goal .
16. min .
maniche volleys instead of a typical ball into the packed penalty area , figo crosses to maniche who shoots the ball straight out the air .
mahdavikia is able to head it out of danger .
18. min .
hashemian is alone up front while the iranian defense try to connect with him on long balls .
credit to the iranians for pulling out of their defensive third to try and win the ball in the midfield .
portugal 's chances are decreasing in quality .
20. min .
nekounam booked he 'll miss the next match after a late foul on figo .
21. min .
deco gets past two defenders and send the ball forward but not in time for pauleta to beat the offside trap .
23. min .
ricardo tested a free kick from mahdavikia flies into the goal box and the portuguese keeper is able to box the ball out .
26. min .
are portugal holding back ?
not much magic yet from the famous portuguese midfield .
they 're not letting the iranians through , but are n't creating many chances in the offensive third .
are portugal just waiting or is this the best they have ?
scolari , at any rate does n't look happy .
27. min .
ronaldo shoots over the goal - his team mates in the middle of the field wish he had crossed the ball instead .
29. min .
corner portugal figo places the ball directly on carvalho 's head ; his redirection misses the far post by inches .
mirzapour has some strong words for his defenders , who did n't even bother to jump to contend the cross .
31. min .
iran gasp hashemian fires a ball that bounces off the post .
a late offside call makes the point moot .
32. min .
madanchi sees yellow a rough foul on ronaldo does n't leave referee poulat a choice , and he books the iranian .
34. min .
ronaldo heads in a figo corner but kaabi , on the near post , cooly chest the ball down and kicks it away .
35. min .
ronaldo 's next chance the 21-year-old is aching for a goal .
he has portugal 's next chance and shoots a rocket into the side netting .
36. min .
figo rolling on ground figo gets mixed up in a rough , high-footed foul from kaabi .
he 's holding is mouth .
38. min .
figo washes out his mouth with some cold water and is back on the field .
39. min .
ronaldo checked off the ball by kaabi .
the portuguese whistle for a card , but poulat is n't interested in their protests .
41. min .
nekounam lays a ball back after beating the portuguese defense , but his strikers were too far forward to get collect it .
42. min .
miguel goes down clutching his left shoulder and ribs after a check from nosrati .
the portuguese player needs some treatment on the field , but the docs are bringing the stretcher away .
44. min .
miguel retakes the field with a bit of slower step .
45. min .
what a chance for portugal just worried about miguel , he makes a run from the back and is served the ball on a platter .
mirzapour somehow makes the save swatting it toward pauleta who does n't believe he was n't ready to tap the ball home .
45 + 1. min .
pauleta booked for delaying the game 90 + 2. min .
three minutes of extra time in frankfurt 45 + 2. min .
figo called for grabbing mahdavikia 's arm in a sprint down the wing .
45 + 3. min .
half-time tie between portugal and iran 45 + 3. min .
iran can thank goalkeeper mirzapour for keeping them even in the first half .
the iranian man of the half came up with a series of acrobatic saves to shut down miguel , ronaldo and deco .
45 + 3. min .
it was n't until the second half that iran collapsed against mexico .
stay with dw-world.de 's live ticker for all the action from the second 45 minutes .
46. min .
the second half is on 47. min .
miguel anticipates well and gets his knees in front of a long ball from karimi , keeping portugal on the attack .
48. min .
deco takes his time getting up after getting hurt on a high kick that catches madanchi in the head .
the portuguese player is booked for the foul when he finally gets to his feet .
50. min .
rezaei takes the ball of ronaldo 's foot and breaks away down the wing .
figo draws him in and relieves him of the ball .
52. min .
iran sustain attack iran 's defenders are doing a better of job of connecting with midfielders and strikers on their clearances out of the back while madanchi and the rest of the offense are also controlling well .
54. min .
deco sends a looper into to pauleta , but kaabi is able to get just enough of his head on to the ball to keep it from landing in front of the striker .
55. min .
pauleta heels it over another portuguese is left to shake his head after a failed chance on goal .
pauleta 's back heel goes high .
56. min .
ronaldo shoot for the inner post after winning a yard from the defense .
mirzapour is able to parry the low shot away and rezaei clears .
57. min .
weak shot from iran mahdavikia breaks loose on the right .
the defense is tough but he 's able to get off a shot that looses its power after hitting the inside of miguel 's leg .
58. min .
mahdavikia crosses in hashemian ; it 's impossible to tell if he mistraps the ball or intended to drop it back for a charging drive but it does n't make a difference as there is no striker to line it up .
60. min .
miguel beats madanchi on the flank but puts the ball too far in front of him and it 's picked off by rezaei .
61. min .
costinha booked costinha misses the ball and trips up karimi to earn a yellow card .
63. min .
portugal score ! 64. min .
figo takes the ball in from the left side and just when everyone thinks he 's going to turn and shoot himself , he uses the vision that made famous and passes back to deco , who does n't waste a millisecond before rocketing it into the back of the net .
66. min .
ronaldo takes his first free kick figo lets the youngster take a free kick that confuses everyone .
mirzapour is n't sure if it 's a cross or a shot and half jumps for it keeping one foot on the ground .
portugal expect a shot and no one moves for it .
68. min .
changes on both sides iran 's madanchi leaves for rasoul khatibi .
ivankovic also pulls karimi for ferydoon zandi while portugal decide maniche should make room for petit .
69. min .
big chance for iran just in the game , khatibi sneaks past meira .
he gets a foot on the ball but ca n't give it enough spin to find the inside of the far post as both meira and ricardo were beat by the surprise iran chance .
72. min .
ronaldo wins a corner taking on two defenders , ronaldo can get just a corner .
72. min .
meira and teymourian have words after pulling each other 's jerseys in a footrace for a ball passed into space .
73. min .
kaabi checks ronaldo again and is shown yellow - it 's a card the ref could have given him for any number of fouls in this match .
76. min .
just under 15 minutes left and both teams are starting to look a little harried .
they know a draw here does n't help anyone .
77. min .
zandi sends a dangerously placed free kick into the wall .
78. min .
zandi crosses to mahdavikia who puts power behind a header ricardo is able to save .
79. min .
penalty for portugal !
figo goes down and portugal are awarded an penalty kick .
ronaldo lines it up .
79. min .
portugal go up by 2 ice cold , ronaldo converts the kick .
80. min .
portugal change deco comes off the field for tiago .
83. min .
the portuguese fans , who had toned it down while iran looked strong that beginning of the second half are coming back to life .
84. min .
figo tries it on his own miguel sees his captain on the far wing and sends him the ball .
the only portuguese player so far forward , figo goes at goal on his own but is jammed by two iranian defenders .
86. min .
golmohammadi fouls ronaldo and falls badly on his own shoulder .
the doctors rush onto the field .
88. min .
golmohammadi slowly leaves the field his right arm massaging his left shoulder .
88. min .
figo taken off for simao sabrosa .
88. min .
before getting off the field golmohammadi was given a questionable yellow card the foul on ronaldo that did more damage to the iranian 's own shoulder .
90 + 1. min .
portugal packs the back sitting on a solid advantage , portugal move all their players into their own end to defend as the ref announces five minutes of stoppage time .
90 + 2. min .
hashemian sees teymourian on the other side of the field and hits his chest with a cross ; the ensuing play is broken up by meira .
90 + 3. min .
mahdavikia 's corner lands on khatibi 's head ; but the sub sends the ball wide .
90 + 4. min .
pauleta ca n't decide if he should fire away one-on-one with the mirzapour or pass off to simao .
by the times he makes up his mind simao is too far forward to collect the rebound off the iranian keeper .
90 + 5. min .
ronaldo almost puts a second goal to his name but is called offside .
90 + 5. min .
that 's all for this match !
ronaldo 's offside attack was the final play of the game and the end of iran 's chances at this world cup .
portugal take over at the top of group d and secure a spot in the round of 16 .
90 + 5. min .
portugal on the way up ?
an improvement over their performance against angola , portugal show they have the patience needed to stay competitive in physical matches .
still , coach scolari will have to hope this was a step for his team on the way to top form - they 'll need to crank it up a few more notches before facing a second round opponent . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup 2006 all of dw-world.de 's coverage of the 2006 world cup .
feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

ronaldo lines it up .
79. min .
portugal go up by 2 ice cold , ronaldo converts the kick .
80. min .
portugal change deco comes off the field for tiago .
83. min .
the portuguese fans , who had toned it down while iran looked strong that beginning of the second half are coming back to life .
84. min .
figo tries it on his own miguel sees his captain on the far wing and sends him the ball .
the only portuguese player so far forward , figo goes at goal on his own but is jammed by two iranian defenders .
86. min .
golmohammadi fouls ronaldo and falls badly on his own shoulder .
the doctors rush onto the field .
88. min .
golmohammadi slowly leaves the field his right arm massaging his left shoulder .
88. min .
figo taken off for simao sabrosa .
88. min .
before getting off the field golmohammadi was given a questionable yellow card the foul on ronaldo that did more damage to the iranian 's own shoulder .
90 + 1. min .
portugal packs the back sitting on a solid advantage , portugal move all their players into their own end to defend as the ref announces five minutes of stoppage time .
90 + 2. min .
hashemian sees teymourian on the other side of the field and hits his chest with a cross ; the ensuing play is broken up by meira .
90 + 3. min .
mahdavikia 's corner lands on khatibi 's head ; but the sub sends the ball wide .
90 + 4. min .
pauleta ca n't decide if he should fire away one-on-one with the mirzapour or pass off to simao .
by the times he makes up his mind simao is too far forward to collect the rebound off the iranian keeper .
90 + 5. min .
ronaldo almost puts a second goal to his name but is called offside .
90 + 5. min .
that 's all for this match !
ronaldo 's offside attack was the final play of the game and the end of iran 's chances at this world cup .
portugal take over at the top of group d and secure a spot in the round of 16 .
90 + 5. min .
portugal on the way up ?
an improvement over their performance against angola , portugal show they have the patience needed to stay competitive in physical matches .
still , coach scolari will have to hope this was a step for his team on the way to top form - they 'll need to crank it up a few more notches before facing a second round opponent . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup 2006 all of dw-world.de 's coverage of the 2006 world cup .
