live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 03.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker . what 's riding on the game ?
like all the second group games between winners - portugal beat angola 1-0 , and losers iran lost to 3-1 to mexico in their first group d games - a win for portugal would mean a sure spot in the round of 16 and three points are essential for iran to avoid an early trip home .
starting line-up announced here 's how the coaches will send out the teams : portugal : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- ricardo ; 13- miguel , 16- ricardo carvalho , 5- fernando meira , 14- nuno valente ; 20- deco , 6- costinha , 18- maniche , 7- luis figo -lrb- captain -rrb- , 17- cristiano ronaldo ; 9- pauleta coach : luiz felipe scolari iran : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1- ebrahim mirzapour ; 13- hossein kaabi , 5- rahman rezaei , 4- yahya golmohammadi -lrb- captain -rrb- , 20- mohammad nosrati ; 2- mehdi mahdavikia , 6- javad nekounam , 8- ali karimi , 14- andranik teymourian ; 21- mehrzad madanchi , 9- vahid hashemian coach : branko ivankovic referee : eric poulat -lrb- france -rrb- deco makes his debut in the 2006 world cup .
look for the portuguese playmaker to add to the team 's creativity in the middle of the field .
conditions cooling down the thermometer reads a comfortable 25 degrees celsius -lrb- 77 f -rrb- as the national anthems are played in frankfurt .
1. min .
iran kick the game off french referee eric poulat blows the whistle and we 're underway .
2. min .
figo sends in a great pass from the bottom corner of the penalty area to deco , but the center ca n't get it under control before being swarmed by iranian defenders .
3. min .
portugal control the ball with imprecise passes that iran are n't trying to cut off .
5. min .
deco changes his shoes just minutes into the match , deco realizes he wants a different pair of cleats on the frankfurt pitch .
players have complained of slippery grass and have lost their footing several times already during the tournament .
8. min .
portugal are moving well up the flanks but ca n't manage to center the ball .
iran give up a corner .
8. min .
figo sends the ball out to maniche ; his long-distance shot sails wide .
10. min .
moving on up miguel dribbles into the penalty box after taking a long run from his defensive position ; his shot is blocked by rezaei 's shin .
11. min .
iran get their first counter attack chance of the match ; they are caught up in midfield giving the portuguese midfielders time to get back .
12. min .
nekounam heads past the goal on an iran free kick .
the pace of the game is picking up .
13. min .
deco fires a left footer from 10 meters out but keeper mirzapour is just able to get his right hand on the ball to swat it over the crossbar .
15. min .
madanchi gets a long ball from midfield and beats the offside trap but ca n't get a foot on the bouncing ball , giving up an excellent chance on goal .
16. min .
maniche volleys instead of a typical ball into the packed penalty area , figo crosses to maniche who shoots the ball straight out the air .
mahdavikia is able to head it out of danger .
18. min .
hashemian is alone up front while the iranian defense try to connect with him on long balls .
credit to the iranians for pulling out of their defensive third to try and win the ball in the midfield .
portugal 's chances are decreasing in quality .
20. min .
nekounam booked he 'll miss the next match after a late foul on figo .
21. min .
deco gets past two defenders and send the ball forward but not in time for pauleta to beat the offside trap .
23. min .
ricardo tested a free kick from mahdavikia flies into the goal box and the portuguese keeper is able to box the ball out .
26. min .
are portugal holding back ?
not much magic yet from the famous portuguese midfield .
they 're not letting the iranians through , but are n't creating many chances in the offensive third .
are portugal just waiting or is this the best they have ?
scolari , at any rate does n't look happy .
27. min .
ronaldo shoots over the goal - his team mates in the middle of the field wish he had crossed the ball instead .
29. min .
corner portugal figo places the ball directly on carvalho 's head ; his redirection misses the far post by inches .
mirzapour has some strong words for his defenders , who did n't even bother to jump to contend the cross .
31. min .
iran gasp hashemian fires a ball that bounces off the post .
a late offside call makes the point moot .
32. min .
madanchi sees yellow a rough foul on ronaldo does n't leave referee poulat a choice , and he books the iranian .
34. min .
ronaldo heads in a figo corner but kaabi , on the near post , cooly chest the ball down and kicks it away .
35. min .
ronaldo 's next chance the 21-year-old is aching for a goal .
he has portugal 's next chance and shoots a rocket into the side netting .
36. min .
figo rolling on ground figo gets mixed up in a rough , high-footed foul from kaabi .
he 's holding is mouth .
38. min .
figo washes out his mouth with some cold water and is back on the field .
39. min .
ronaldo checked off the ball by kaabi .
the portuguese whistle for a card , but poulat is n't interested in their protests .
41. min .
nekounam lays a ball back after beating the portuguese defense , but his strikers were too far forward to get collect it .
42. min .
miguel goes down clutching his left shoulder and ribs after a check from nosrati .
the portuguese player needs some treatment on the field , but the docs are bringing the stretcher away .
44. min .
miguel retakes the field with a bit of slower step .
45. min .
what a chance for portugal just worried about miguel , he makes a run from the back and is served the ball on a platter .
mirzapour somehow makes the save swatting it toward pauleta who does n't believe he was n't ready to tap the ball home .
45 + 1. min .
pauleta booked for delaying the game 90 + 2. min .
three minutes of extra time in frankfurt 45 + 2. min .
figo called for grabbing mahdavikia 's arm in a sprint down the wing .
45 + 3. min .
half-time tie between portugal and iran 45 + 3. min .
iran can thank goalkeeper mirzapour for keeping them even in the first half .
the iranian man of the half came up with a series of acrobatic saves to shut down miguel , ronaldo and deco .
45 + 3. min .
it was n't until the second half that iran collapsed against mexico .
stay with dw-world.de 's live ticker for all the action from the second 45 minutes .
46. min .
the second half is on 47. min .
miguel anticipates well and gets his knees in front of a long ball from karimi , keeping portugal on the attack .
48. min .
deco takes his time getting up after getting hurt on a high kick that catches madanchi in the head .
the portuguese player is booked for the foul when he finally gets to his feet .
50. min .
rezaei takes the ball of ronaldo 's foot and breaks away down the wing .
figo draws him in and relieves him of the ball .
52. min .
iran sustain attack iran 's defenders are doing a better of job of connecting with midfielders and strikers on their clearances out of the back while madanchi and the rest of the offense are also controlling well .
54. min .
deco sends a looper into to pauleta , but kaabi is able to get just enough of his head on to the ball to keep it from landing in front of the striker .
55. min .
pauleta heels it over another portuguese is left to shake his head after a failed chance on goal .
pauleta 's back heel goes high .
56. min .
ronaldo shoot for the inner post after winning a yard from the defense .
mirzapour is able to parry the low shot away and rezaei clears .
57. min .
weak shot from iran mahdavikia breaks loose on the right .
the defense is tough but he 's able to get off a shot that looses its power after hitting the inside of miguel 's leg .
58. min .
mahdavikia crosses in hashemian ; it 's impossible to tell if he mistraps the ball or intended to drop it back for a charging drive but it does n't make a difference as there is no striker to line it up .
60. min .
miguel beats madanchi on the flank but puts the ball too far in front of him and it 's picked off by rezaei .
61. min .
costinha booked costinha misses the ball and trips up karimi to earn a yellow card .
63. min .
portugal score ! 64. min .
figo takes the ball in from the left side and just when everyone thinks he 's going to turn and shoot himself , he uses the vision that made famous and passes back to deco , who does n't waste a millisecond before rocketing it into the back of the net .
66. min .
ronaldo takes his first free kick figo lets the youngster take a free kick that confuses everyone .
mirzapour is n't sure if it 's a cross or a shot and half jumps for it keeping one foot on the ground .
portugal expect a shot and no one moves for it .
68. min .
changes on both sides iran 's madanchi leaves for rasoul khatibi .
ivankovic also pulls karimi for ferydoon zandi while portugal decide maniche should make room for petit .
69. min .
big chance for iran just in the game , khatibi sneaks past meira .
he gets a foot on the ball but ca n't give it enough spin to find the inside of the far post as both meira and ricardo were beat by the surprise iran chance .
72. min .
ronaldo wins a corner taking on two defenders , ronaldo can get just a corner .
72. min .
meira and teymourian have words after pulling each other 's jerseys in a footrace for a ball passed into space .
73. min .
kaabi checks ronaldo again and is shown yellow - it 's a card the ref could have given him for any number of fouls in this match .
76. min .
just under 15 minutes left and both teams are starting to look a little harried .
they know a draw here does n't help anyone .
77. min .
zandi sends a dangerously placed free kick into the wall .
78. min .
zandi crosses to mahdavikia who puts power behind a header ricardo is able to save .
79. min .
penalty for portugal !
figo goes down and portugal are awarded an penalty kick .
ronaldo lines it up .
79. min .
portugal go up by 2 ice cold , ronaldo converts the kick .
80. min .
portugal change deco comes off the field for tiago .
83. min .
the portuguese fans , who had toned it down while iran looked strong that beginning of the second half are coming back to life .
84. min .
figo tries it on his own miguel sees his captain on the far wing and sends him the ball .
the only portuguese player so far forward , figo goes at goal on his own but is jammed by two iranian defenders .
86. min .
golmohammadi fouls ronaldo and falls badly on his own shoulder .
the doctors rush onto the field .
88. min .
golmohammadi slowly leaves the field his right arm massaging his left shoulder .
88. min .
figo taken off for simao sabrosa .
88. min .
before getting off the field golmohammadi was given a questionable yellow card the foul on ronaldo that did more damage to the iranian 's own shoulder .
90 + 1. min .
portugal packs the back sitting on a solid advantage , portugal move all their players into their own end to defend as the ref announces five minutes of stoppage time .
90 + 2. min .
hashemian sees teymourian on the other side of the field and hits his chest with a cross ; the ensuing play is broken up by meira .
90 + 3. min .
mahdavikia 's corner lands on khatibi 's head ; but the sub sends the ball wide .
90 + 4. min .
pauleta ca n't decide if he should fire away one-on-one with the mirzapour or pass off to simao .
by the times he makes up his mind simao is too far forward to collect the rebound off the iranian keeper .
90 + 5. min .
ronaldo almost puts a second goal to his name but is called offside .
90 + 5. min .
that 's all for this match !
ronaldo 's offside attack was the final play of the game and the end of iran 's chances at this world cup .
portugal take over at the top of group d and secure a spot in the round of 16 .
90 + 5. min .
portugal on the way up ?
an improvement over their performance against angola , portugal show they have the patience needed to stay competitive in physical matches .
still , coach scolari will have to hope this was a step for his team on the way to top form - they 'll need to crank it up a few more notches before facing a second round opponent . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup 2006 all of dw-world.de 's coverage of the 2006 world cup .
feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

ghana claims first world cup win for africa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- 9801 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- feedback what did you think of the game ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

ghana claims first world cup win for africa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- feedback what did you think of the game ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : cristiano ronaldo -lrb- 17 -rrb- celebrates his penalty following deco 's long distance screamer portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory . iran offered robust resistance for more than an hour before brazilian-born deco 's unstoppable opener .
cristiano ronaldo settled the matter with a penalty 10 minutes from the end . the win guarantees portugal 's progress from group d , while mexico and angola are both in contention for the other qualification spot .
it is the first time portugal has made it past the first round since 1966 , when eusebio inspired them to third place in england . after some bad-tempered exchanges , portugal 's class told in the 63rd minute . cutting in from the left , captain luis figo laid off to deco whose first-time shot sailed into the right corner , giving iran 's goalkeeper no chance . iran were not done and vahid hashemian 's powerful header forced a smart stop from ricardo . but it was all over when captain yahya golmohammadi sent his opposite number figo tumbling in the box , allowing ronaldo to step up and bury his penalty in the top right-hand corner . physical iran counter portugal 's flair with tough tackles bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the tricky ronaldo was on the end of some brutal treatment portugal were mostly on the attack throughout the game , enjoying the best of the action in an ill-tempered first period when some heavy challenges brought protests from coach luiz felipe scolari . portugal went close near half-time when miguel 's run and shot from an acute angle squirmed under goalkeeper ebrahim mirzapour and bounced across the face of goal . early on , figo picked out deco in the box but his fierce shot was palmed away .
figo also floated a free-kick to maniche but his volley from distance was headed over by the iranian defense . the trick-filled ronaldo enjoyed a busy first half , juggling the ball on the edge of the area at one point . he skimmed the outside of the post and blazed one over but cut a frustrated figure at half-time after a series of decisions went iran 's way . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the mercurial luis figo ran the game from midfield iran 's action was mainly restricted to set-pieces , although javad nekounam hit the post before being ruled offside . ronaldo continued to shine after the break , forcing a sharp save from mirzapour at his near post . pauleta tried to meet a nuno valente cross with the outside of his right boot but the flick flew over . at the other end , iran came close when a long ball found rasoul khatibi in the area but his shot went across the face of the goal . iran battled on until penalty broke resolve but portugal 's second goal broke iranian resolve and , with centre-half golmohammadi subbed off injured , they finished the match on the defensive . pauleta had a chance to increase his record goals tally in the final minutes but shot tamely , and ronaldo had a goal ruled out for offside on the whistle . portugal beat angola 1-0 in their opening game while iran went down 3-1 to mexico . portugal need only draw with mexico on wednesday to win the group . iran have now only won one world cup match in three visits , a 2-1 win over the united states in 1998 , but they have a chance to rectify that when they meet angola on wednesday . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de on track portugal meet embattled iran struggling to stay on in the tournament and missing captain and top-scorer ali daei , beleaguered iran face portugal in the group d match in frankfurt on saturday .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- portugal come out ahead of former colony on world cup pitch the score might have been higher and the quality of play better , but portugal will enjoy leaving cologne with a win and angola will be celebrated at home for holding their former rulers to one goal .
-lrb- june 11 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : portugal 2:0 iran review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker .
www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback is this portugal 's year ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 ghana claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .

team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us will have their work cut out if they are to stop rampaging italy the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener . playing mighty italy after a disappointing world cup defeat is just the sort of challenge needed for the united states to prove the team 's character , us coach bruce arena said this week . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bruce arena hopes the us will prove its character against italy " this is the moment to shine , to step up and show what you 're about , " arena said .
" i think they are ready to give a good effort . " giving no hints of the lineup changes he plans for saturday 's match , arena said he expects players to answer their wake-up call and play better then than they did in a 3-0 loss monday to the czech republic in a group e opener . us fears italian strikers " all we did is loose a game .
the challenge in any sport is how you respond , " arena said .
" naturally there is over-reaction in the short term .
if there is any kind of quality in the team , you bounce back . " but the us will need more than morale-boosting to perform against the azzuri , who thrashed ghana 2-0 in their first world cup game . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : italy 's alberto gilardino poses a major threat to the us fiorentina striker luca toni and ac milan forward alberto gilardino are italy 's top threats , supported by some of best set-up men in the sport . " the guys we 're most concerned about are their two strikers , who are probably among the best tandem of strikers in the world cup , " arena said .
" both are tremendous finishers .
gilardino is a lethal finisher inside the box and he is in position all the time , " arena said .
" they have an excellent midfield .
if they sit back , you need to be patient , pick your chances , not get caught on the break .
they are going to be selective on how they attack you . " the us need at least one point to have a chance of advancing after crashing 3-0 to the czechs in their opener . more than just a game the americans are already looking forward to a world cup homecoming in kaiserslautern , which is close to a major us air base .
renamed " k-town " by the 55,000 american soldiers and their families stationed there who struggle to pronounce its german name , the smallest world cup venue is probably the most americanized city in europe . us striker eddie johnson said the encounter against italy is more than just another soccer game . " it 's like the world cup , we 're here for war , " johnson told reporters .
" we 're going to do what we gotta do .
you 've got to do things when the referee 's not looking .
you 've go to do what we have to do to get three points .
i do n't want to go home early . " us who ? bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : reyna 's the only face the italians can identify from the us squad the italians ' preparations for the game will have to start from scratch , with most players confessing complete ignorance about who they will be up again .
of three italian players asked what they knew about the american team , only midfielder andrea pirlo was able to name a single member of the squad . " there is -lrb- claudio -rrb- reyna , who plays in europe and then there is the other lad from psv eindhoven , " said pirlo , referring to midfielder damarcus beasley . " i do n't know much about the players who do n't play in europe , but we will watch some videos , " added pirlo , who scored the opening goal against ghana . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup team checks : usa once the usa were not even considered capable of playing " the other football " .
but after a quarter-final push in the 2002 world cup , their stock rose and the americans are currently ranked fifth in the world .
world cup team checks : italy italian soccer has suffered many insults over the years .
their style on the pitch may not match their style off it but the italians are always a force to be reckoned with and their world cup record speaks for itself .
impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 12 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

officials positive about world cup security , and fans -pipe- features -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 06.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de features -pipe- 17.06.2006 officials positive about world cup security , and fans großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : lots of excitement , few security problems at the tournament so far a senior german security official has expressed satisfaction with the first week of the world cup and forecast that the tournament will remain peaceful .
fan behavior has also come in for praise . so far , the only significant trouble came alongside wednesday 's germany-poland match in dortmund , where 430 people were detained briefly . " it shows that security forces trained just as hard for the world cup as the german national team did , " said jörg ziercke , the head of germany 's federal criminal office , was quoted as telling the daily neue osnabrücker zeitung on saturday , adding he saw no indication of a terrorist threat . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : jörg ziercke , president of germany 's federal criminal office " the police are very watchful and vigorous action is being taken consistently against troublemakers - as on wednesday in dortmund , " he added .
" i am firmly convinced that the games will remain peaceful . " alluding to possible activities by germany 's far right , ziercke said that " we will not meet with tolerance actions of intolerance against the state of law . " a string of attacks on nonwhites in the weeks before the world cup , particularly in germany 's formerly communist east , raised concerns ahead of the tournament .
it unleashed a debate about the existence of " no-go areas " in the east and some groups urged nonwhites to avoid the areas for their own safety . the debate threatened to mar the image germany hopes to project during the tournament , that of an open , tolerant and basically fun-loving society . praise for england another round of praise went to england 's fans , who are often the pariahs of international soccer due their reputation for hooliganism . this time , according to wolfgang niersbach , vice-president of the german organizing committee , the behaviour of england 's supporters has been one of the hightlights of the four-week tournament . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : english fans " by our estimates , there were 60,000 or 70,000 english fans in nuremberg for the match against trinidad & tobago and their exemplary behaviour was being discussed by many people , " he told reporters at fifa 's daily news briefing on friday . during the thursday game in nuremberg , only 26 england fans were detained by police before and after england 's 2-0 win . kevin miles , international coordinator for the -lrb- english -rrb- football supporters federation , told reuters his group has always maintained that the majority of england fans behave well for the majority of the time . " i am delighted to hear that excellent behaviour of england fans has been recognized by the authorities , " he said . niersbach also applauded the conduct of swedish fans in berlin for thursday 's match against paraguay , and the fact that many germans put on sweden 's yellow shirts in support of the scandinavians . " the atmosphere at the stadiums was incredible , " he said .
" the fans are behaving so well , long may it continue . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de international cops arrive to boost security for world cup germany has left little to chance in its preparations to host the soccer world cup .
police officers from 13 nations have arrived in the country to help identify and rein in potential troublemakers .
-lrb- june 7 , 2006 -rrb- german interior minister : " people will feel safe " in an interview with dw-tv , german interior and sports minister wolfgang schäuble said that all measures had been taken to ensure that the biggest event in germany 's modern history will be safe .
-lrb- june 3 , 2006 -rrb- hooligan violence rears its head for germany-poland game even as millions in germany celebrated their team 's hard-earned win over poland , police in dortmund , the game 's venue , had their hands full after german and polish fans clashed there .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- 9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures interviews the stars have their say world cup stars talk to dw-world.de about the tournament .

claims first world cup win for africa großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : better finishing skills could have inflated ghana 's win ghana delivered the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup in their second ever finals match with a deserved win against the czech republic on saturday . better finishing skills would have made the result even clearer for the african team that missed numerous chances on goal , especially in the second half . asamoah gyan hit the post on a penalty kick in the 66th minute and nearly every one of ghana 's strikers and midfields shot directly into czech goalkeeper petr cech in the second 45 minutes . ghana scored their first ever world cup goal just over one minute into the game when gyan hammered a low shot home after tomas ujfalusi , who would later receive a red card for the foul leading the penalty kick , was unable to head away a looping cross . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the only shots kingson did n't save went off the field the czechs were lucky not to go two down in the 32nd minute when gyan again broke through only to be denied by cech , and again while captain stephen appiah shot narrowly wide a few minutes later with the czech goalie stranded . the injury-hit czechs suffered from having only one striker and lacked an edge to stretch the sometimes shaky ghanaian defense to breaking point without injured strikers jan koller and milan baros . by the end of the first half ghana had a solid grip on the game , keeping the czechs out of their penalty area and peppering cech with shots . the ghana defense stood solid when the czechs look like they would equalize coming out of the break and fended off runs from tomas rosicky and czech soccer legend pavel nedved , who was ruled offsides after putting the ball past keeper richard kingson in the 46th minute . with just eight minutes left in the match , sulley muntari took a square pass from gyan and ripped a short-range shot high past cech into the top of the net to close the day 's scoring . the ghanaians continued their attack on cech , who needed all his goalkeeping skills to fend off ensuing attacks from michael essien and gyan . the win kept ghana 's chances at advancing to the next round alive after a 2-0 loss to italy in their opener .
they play the united states in their final match in a wide-open group . the czech republic , who drubbed the usa 3-0 last week , will have to play italy for the points they need to advance to the round of 16 . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .

there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .

east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol -pipe- germany -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 13.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : focus on eastern germany museum takes controversial look at mundane east germany eastern germany gets pep talk on wasting money a win-win situation for american investors in east germany how the stasi rigged east german sports germany -pipe- 17.06.2006 east german loses copyright battle over beloved traffic symbol großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the ampelmännchen has found a place in many a german heart an east german businessman on friday lost a copyright battle over the use of the former communist state 's beloved traffic light symbol , the ampelmännchen , to a souvenir entrepreneur from the west . a court in leipzig ruled that joachim rossberg 's right to use the stocky , hat-wearing ampelmännchen , or traffic-light man , as a marketing brand had largely lapsed . this was argued by lawyers for the berlin-based company ampelmännchen ltd . , which since 1997 has been doing a roaring trade in souvenirs , from t-shirts to sweets , bearing the likeness of ampelmännchen . they said the copyright had passed back into the public domain as rossberg , who lives in the eastern state of saxony , had not exercised it for five years . the court found that rossberg retains only the right to use the distinctive street-crossing symbol to market liqueur , and may no longer use it as a logo on beer and t-shirts .
he said that he would appeal the ruling . easy to read , and fun the ampelmännchen was created in 1961 by a traffic psychologist , karl peglau , when an increase in cars in the former east germany made the streets more dangerous for pedestrians . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : joachim rossberg has said he 'll appeal the ruling peglau wanted a symbol that would appeal to children and could easily be read by the elderly .
he therefore deliberately made the figure as clear , and cute , as possible . after the fall of the berlin wall , the ampelmännchen acquired cult status . the authorities wanted to replace him with the standard western traffic sign , but residents of the former east launched a successful campaign to keep a part of their culture .
at the same time , the figure also became popular with tourists who could now freely travel to the former german democratic republic . ampelmännchen ltd was founded by markus heckhausen , a graphic designer from the western city of tübingen who moved to berlin . the court case has been seen by some as part of the cultural and political struggle between residents of the two parts of the reunified country , in which the underdog east generally loses . dw staff / afp -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de traffic-light man in tug-of-war between east and west he survived the fall of communism , but the trials and tribulations of the traffic-light man from former east germany are far from over .
-lrb- feb .
1 , 2006 -rrb- back in the gdr a prize-winning documentary project , now available as a dvd-rom , explores the history of the german democratic republic through the eyes of those who lived it .
-lrb- may 3 , 2006 -rrb- television joins the " ostalgie " bandwagon a wave of television revival shows on life in former communist east germany have hit the airwaves in germany .
critics fear they play down the repressive reality of the system .

25 , 2003 -rrb- 9798 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .

uzbeks pedal incredible lengths to meet hero kahn -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 27.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : from europe 's heart to the center of asia " germany has done everything in its power to undermine uzbek sanctions " steinmeier : europe needs to take a closer look at central asia european union extends sanctions against uzbekistan frank walter steinmeier heads for kyrgyzstan news -pipe- 17.06.2006 uzbeks pedal incredible lengths to meet hero kahn großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : kahn might sometimes feel unloved at home , but to two uzbeks , he 's the greatest two fanatical football fans completed a remarkable 6,500 kilometers bike journey from uzbekistan to berlin to get the autograph of their hero , german goalkeeper oliver kahn . according to a report in the süddeutsche zeitung newspaper , akram marufshonow and his friend musadshon chornidow , both 58 , embarked on their journey from the uzbekistan capital tashkent on march 8 , not to see their team play - uzbekistan is not in the tournament - but to engage in a little hero worship . the autograph hunters braved rain and snow as they cycled over 4,000 miles to germany via kazakhstan , russia , belarus and poland , doing part-time jobs to pay for food . " our hands and faces were blue at times it was that cold , " akram revealed .
" but i am not leaving without kahn 's autograph . " wish fulfilled kahn , who was voted most valuable player at the 2002 world cup in japan and south korea even though he lost the top goalie spot in this tournament to jens lehmann , was amazed to hear of the young fans ' cross-continent journey in order to meet him and agreed to meet them in berlin the uzbekistan duo watched the world cup curtain-raiser between germany and costa rica on june 9 at the berlin fan mile located next to the brandenburg gate and on friday they got their wish granted . bayern munich goalkeeper kahn was pictured smiling as he signed his name to make akram and musadshon 's dreams come true . " my heart is racing i am overjoyed , " confessed akram . kahn , who turned 37 on thursday , admitted their story had touched him , saying : " i can not believe it .
it is incredible . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de beate uhse loses its world cup buzz bad news for german soccer fans : olli k. and michael b. will not be bringing pleasure to supporters during the world cup .
and as for england , their fans can forget about any buzzing performances from a certain david b.
-lrb- may 25 , 2006 -rrb- jens lehmann named german number one for world cup germany 's number one goalkeeper at the 2006 world cup will be arsenal stopper jens lehmann , it was revealed friday .
german coach jürgen klinsmann has decided to demote bayern munich 's oliver kahn to the role of deputy .
-lrb- april 7 , 2006 -rrb- kahn still worth his weight in gold to advertisers despite oliver kahn 's demotion to the national team 's reserve goalkeeper , sponsors are staying true to the 36-year old .
-lrb- april 15 , 2006 -rrb- feedback are you an oliver kahn fan ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 14.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us will have their work cut out if they are to stop rampaging italy the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener . playing mighty italy after a disappointing world cup defeat is just the sort of challenge needed for the united states to prove the team 's character , us coach bruce arena said this week . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bruce arena hopes the us will prove its character against italy " this is the moment to shine , to step up and show what you 're about , " arena said .
" i think they are ready to give a good effort . " giving no hints of the lineup changes he plans for saturday 's match , arena said he expects players to answer their wake-up call and play better then than they did in a 3-0 loss monday to the czech republic in a group e opener . us fears italian strikers " all we did is loose a game .
the challenge in any sport is how you respond , " arena said .
" naturally there is over-reaction in the short term .
if there is any kind of quality in the team , you bounce back . " but the us will need more than morale-boosting to perform against the azzuri , who thrashed ghana 2-0 in their first world cup game . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : italy 's alberto gilardino poses a major threat to the us fiorentina striker luca toni and ac milan forward alberto gilardino are italy 's top threats , supported by some of best set-up men in the sport . " the guys we 're most concerned about are their two strikers , who are probably among the best tandem of strikers in the world cup , " arena said .
" both are tremendous finishers .
gilardino is a lethal finisher inside the box and he is in position all the time , " arena said .
" they have an excellent midfield .
if they sit back , you need to be patient , pick your chances , not get caught on the break .
they are going to be selective on how they attack you . " the us need at least one point to have a chance of advancing after crashing 3-0 to the czechs in their opener . more than just a game the americans are already looking forward to a world cup homecoming in kaiserslautern , which is close to a major us air base .
renamed " k-town " by the 55,000 american soldiers and their families stationed there who struggle to pronounce its german name , the smallest world cup venue is probably the most americanized city in europe . us striker eddie johnson said the encounter against italy is more than just another soccer game . " it 's like the world cup , we 're here for war , " johnson told reporters .
" we 're going to do what we gotta do .
you 've got to do things when the referee 's not looking .
you 've go to do what we have to do to get three points .
i do n't want to go home early . " us who ? bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : reyna 's the only face the italians can identify from the us squad the italians ' preparations for the game will have to start from scratch , with most players confessing complete ignorance about who they will be up again .
of three italian players asked what they knew about the american team , only midfielder andrea pirlo was able to name a single member of the squad . " there is -lrb- claudio -rrb- reyna , who plays in europe and then there is the other lad from psv eindhoven , " said pirlo , referring to midfielder damarcus beasley . " i do n't know much about the players who do n't play in europe , but we will watch some videos , " added pirlo , who scored the opening goal against ghana . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup team checks : usa once the usa were not even considered capable of playing " the other football " .
but after a quarter-final push in the 2002 world cup , their stock rose and the americans are currently ranked fifth in the world .
world cup team checks : italy italian soccer has suffered many insults over the years .
their style on the pitch may not match their style off it but the italians are always a force to be reckoned with and their world cup record speaks for itself .
impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 12 , 2006 -rrb- 9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .
klinsmann springs surprises in naming world cup squad germany world cup squad stadiums check out the 12 venues for the 2006 world cup .
