program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : cristiano ronaldo -lrb- 17 -rrb- celebrates his penalty following deco 's long distance screamer portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory . iran offered robust resistance for more than an hour before brazilian-born deco 's unstoppable opener .
cristiano ronaldo settled the matter with a penalty 10 minutes from the end . the win guarantees portugal 's progress from group d , while mexico and angola are both in contention for the other qualification spot .
it is the first time portugal has made it past the first round since 1966 , when eusebio inspired them to third place in england . after some bad-tempered exchanges , portugal 's class told in the 63rd minute . cutting in from the left , captain luis figo laid off to deco whose first-time shot sailed into the right corner , giving iran 's goalkeeper no chance . iran were not done and vahid hashemian 's powerful header forced a smart stop from ricardo . but it was all over when captain yahya golmohammadi sent his opposite number figo tumbling in the box , allowing ronaldo to step up and bury his penalty in the top right-hand corner . physical iran counter portugal 's flair with tough tackles bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the tricky ronaldo was on the end of some brutal treatment portugal were mostly on the attack throughout the game , enjoying the best of the action in an ill-tempered first period when some heavy challenges brought protests from coach luiz felipe scolari . portugal went close near half-time when miguel 's run and shot from an acute angle squirmed under goalkeeper ebrahim mirzapour and bounced across the face of goal . early on , figo picked out deco in the box but his fierce shot was palmed away .
figo also floated a free-kick to maniche but his volley from distance was headed over by the iranian defense . the trick-filled ronaldo enjoyed a busy first half , juggling the ball on the edge of the area at one point . he skimmed the outside of the post and blazed one over but cut a frustrated figure at half-time after a series of decisions went iran 's way . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the mercurial luis figo ran the game from midfield iran 's action was mainly restricted to set-pieces , although javad nekounam hit the post before being ruled offside . ronaldo continued to shine after the break , forcing a sharp save from mirzapour at his near post . pauleta tried to meet a nuno valente cross with the outside of his right boot but the flick flew over . at the other end , iran came close when a long ball found rasoul khatibi in the area but his shot went across the face of the goal . iran battled on until penalty broke resolve but portugal 's second goal broke iranian resolve and , with centre-half golmohammadi subbed off injured , they finished the match on the defensive . pauleta had a chance to increase his record goals tally in the final minutes but shot tamely , and ronaldo had a goal ruled out for offside on the whistle . portugal beat angola 1-0 in their opening game while iran went down 3-1 to mexico . portugal need only draw with mexico on wednesday to win the group . iran have now only won one world cup match in three visits , a 2-1 win over the united states in 1998 , but they have a chance to rectify that when they meet angola on wednesday . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de on track portugal meet embattled iran struggling to stay on in the tournament and missing captain and top-scorer ali daei , beleaguered iran face portugal in the group d match in frankfurt on saturday .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- portugal come out ahead of former colony on world cup pitch the score might have been higher and the quality of play better , but portugal will enjoy leaving cologne with a win and angola will be celebrated at home for holding their former rulers to one goal .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : cristiano ronaldo -lrb- 17 -rrb- celebrates his penalty following deco 's long distance screamer portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory . iran offered robust resistance for more than an hour before brazilian-born deco 's unstoppable opener .
cristiano ronaldo settled the matter with a penalty 10 minutes from the end . the win guarantees portugal 's progress from group d , while mexico and angola are both in contention for the other qualification spot .
it is the first time portugal has made it past the first round since 1966 , when eusebio inspired them to third place in england . after some bad-tempered exchanges , portugal 's class told in the 63rd minute . cutting in from the left , captain luis figo laid off to deco whose first-time shot sailed into the right corner , giving iran 's goalkeeper no chance . iran were not done and vahid hashemian 's powerful header forced a smart stop from ricardo . but it was all over when captain yahya golmohammadi sent his opposite number figo tumbling in the box , allowing ronaldo to step up and bury his penalty in the top right-hand corner . physical iran counter portugal 's flair with tough tackles bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the tricky ronaldo was on the end of some brutal treatment portugal were mostly on the attack throughout the game , enjoying the best of the action in an ill-tempered first period when some heavy challenges brought protests from coach luiz felipe scolari . portugal went close near half-time when miguel 's run and shot from an acute angle squirmed under goalkeeper ebrahim mirzapour and bounced across the face of goal . early on , figo picked out deco in the box but his fierce shot was palmed away .
figo also floated a free-kick to maniche but his volley from distance was headed over by the iranian defense . the trick-filled ronaldo enjoyed a busy first half , juggling the ball on the edge of the area at one point . he skimmed the outside of the post and blazed one over but cut a frustrated figure at half-time after a series of decisions went iran 's way . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the mercurial luis figo ran the game from midfield iran 's action was mainly restricted to set-pieces , although javad nekounam hit the post before being ruled offside . ronaldo continued to shine after the break , forcing a sharp save from mirzapour at his near post . pauleta tried to meet a nuno valente cross with the outside of his right boot but the flick flew over . at the other end , iran came close when a long ball found rasoul khatibi in the area but his shot went across the face of the goal . iran battled on until penalty broke resolve but portugal 's second goal broke iranian resolve and , with centre-half golmohammadi subbed off injured , they finished the match on the defensive . pauleta had a chance to increase his record goals tally in the final minutes but shot tamely , and ronaldo had a goal ruled out for offside on the whistle . portugal beat angola 1-0 in their opening game while iran went down 3-1 to mexico . portugal need only draw with mexico on wednesday to win the group . iran have now only won one world cup match in three visits , a 2-1 win over the united states in 1998 , but they have a chance to rectify that when they meet angola on wednesday . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de on track portugal meet embattled iran struggling to stay on in the tournament and missing captain and top-scorer ali daei , beleaguered iran face portugal in the group d match in frankfurt on saturday .

live ticker : italy 1:1 usa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 10.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : italy 1:1 usa review all the action as it happened with dw-world.de 's live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker in-form italy take on the united states in the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern in the next group e game .
the group has been thrown wide open by ghana 's 2-0 win over the czech republic in cologne earlier in the day .
with the czechs , ghanians and the italians all on three points with one win each , a usa win tonight will leave the group in the balance going into the final game on thursday june 22 .
the teams : italy -lrb- 4-3-1-2 -rrb- : 1-gianluigi buffon ; 2-cristian zaccardo , 13-alessandro nesta , 5-fabio cannavaro , 19-gianluca zambrotta ; 4-daniele de rossi , 21-andrea pirlo , 20-simone perrotta ; 10-francesco totti ; 9-luca toni , 11-alberto gilardino .
united states -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 18-kasey keller ; 6-steve cherundolo , 22-oguchi onyewu , 23-eddie pope , 3-carlos bocanegra ; 8-clint dempsey , 10-claudio reyna , 4-pablo mastroeni , 15-bobby convey ; 21-landon donovan , 20-brian mcbride .
coaches make changes for this crucial game italy coach marcello lippi has brought in fit-again defender gianluca zambrotta in place of fabio grosso .
zambrotta missed the 2-0 win over ghana on monday with a thigh injury .
usa coach bruce arena has made two changes from the side which lost 3-0 to the czech republic with carlos bocanegra replacing eddie lewis at left back and clint dempsey slotting in for damarcus beasley on the right side of midfield .
usa looking to harness power of " home " crowd it 's a home game of sorts for the united states as a huge number of service personnel from the nearby us air base at rammstein and their families swell the 52,000 increased capacity at the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern .
the initimate cauldron-like stadium generates a rousing atmosphere and the two teams will feel that the crowd are right on them as the game progresses .
it is unlikely that the experienced italians will be intimidated , however .
the teams come out onto the pitch italy and the usa enter the stadium on what is a balmy summer evening in kaiserslautern .
recent scorching temperatures have dropped marginally but both teams will certainly feel the heat as the game gets underway .
both teams and sets of supporters conduct themselves well during the anthems ; although what the mother of one fan will make of her son singing the italian anthem in only his lycra boxer shorts is anyone 's guess ...
no place for the fit gennarro gattuso italian coach lippi keeps the combative midfielder from ac milan on the bench for the start although what a weapon to have in your arsenal .
we can expect to see gattuso later if things get tight for the azzurri .
1. min .
kick-off : usa gets the game started the usa gets this crucial group e game underway .
1. min .
bocanegra makes the first clearance but it 's a nervous one which gives italy a throw .
the long throw comes in and luca toni gets a glance on the ball but it goes wide .
3. min .
fabio cannavaro prowls ahead of his back four as italy look to build patiently .
the azzurri will look to break the usa down with their passing game .
4. min .
francesco totti gets the first card 4. min .
the italy striker slides in on clint dempsey and gets the yellow card for the late challenge with barely five minutes on the clock .
6. min .
the usa are giving as hard as they get and the game 's physical nature has come to the fore early as players litter the pitch after a number of fierce challenges .
7. min .
landon donovan goes down in the box as he tries to get on the end of a long cross .
the us crowd want a penalty but donovan appears to have slipped .
9. min .
the usa are growing in confidence as they increase their possession , passing their way intelligently to the edge of the italy box as they look for an opening .
11. min .
if italy are looking to hit the usa on the break they are doing everything right apart from actually getting the ball and breaking !
the whole team except toni is in the italian half waiting to break up the us attacks .
13. min .
the newly returned zambrotta shows the us what danger can come of committed too many men into attack .
he breaks dangerously but is fouled on the elft flank by steve cherundolo .
free-kick .
13. min .
the free-kick is floated in but there is a foul in the box and the ref gives the advantage to the us .
14. min .
the usa breaks and gets a dangerous free-kick right on the edge of the italian box .
15. min .
bobby convey takes the kick but it comes off the wall .
corner-kick .
the ball comes over and is hit back into the box .
convey hovers on the left and picks up the loose ball before hitting a rising shot well over the bar .
a good chance for the us .
18. min .
a great move from the usa carves open the italian defense .
eight passes end in clint dempsey fooling fabio cannavaro and hitting a shot on the turn .
the ball skims just wide of buffon 's goal .
20. min .
eddie pope gets the next card the us defender is the last man as the long ball out of defense comes over .
he has no other choice but to haul down gilardino and is lucky just to get a yellow .
21. min .
goal italy 22. min .
gilardino dives in at the near post to head in italy filled the box waiting for the free-kick but the ball came in early and the milan striker gilardino dived in front of everyone to arrow an unstoppable low header past kasey keller .
you 'd have to say the goal comes against the run of play .
24. min .
the usa will have to show character now .
when they went behind to the czech republic , they had no reply and were taken apart at will .
the italians will be just as ruthless given the chance .
26. min .
goal usa 27. min .
cristian zaccardo scores a bizzare own goal !
the italian defender goes to sweep away the deep cross from convey but he misses the ball completely and diverts the ball past buffon with his standing leg .
28. min .
de rossi gets a straight red ! !
daniele de rossi sees red for a blatant and vicious elbow which leaves brian mcbride with a face covered in blood .
31. min .
with the blood levels up and the pace incessant , luca toni breaks on the left and whips a cross-shot past kasey keller but also past the far post .
32. min .
the usa break and brian mcbride , patched up and back on , is outjumped as the cross comes in .
corner usa .
the ball comes in and dempsey connects well but his header is way over .
35. min .
gattuso comes on for totti gennarro gattuso comes on to shore up the italian midfield .
totti makes way for the milan enforcer .
36. min .
disallowed goal for italy gattuso makes an immediate impression by putting the ball in the net with an exquisite chip but luca toni , not interfering with play and returning from an offside position , is deemed to be offside .
the goal , which looks good in the replays , does n't stand .
40. min .
italy look to soak up pressure and hit gilardino with long balls over the already cautioned eddie pope .
the us look to exploit the sending off of de rossi by piling forward in numbers , swamping the retreating defense .
42. min .
bocanegra shoots !
a great long distance effort from carlos bocanegra dips just over the bar and ends up in the top netting .
it would have been a peach of a goal to take the lead with just before half-time .
43. min .
claudio reyna is the next us player to go close but his shot is deflected behind for a corner .
45. min .
pablo mastroeni gets a straight red !
the us defender is the next one heading for an early bath after a late challenge which completely missed the ball but took andrea pirlo 's ankle .
it 's now ten versus ten .
45 + 3. min .
half-time : a goal apiece ; a red card apiece the us and italy come off the pitch after an incident packed first-half .
45. min .
second-half : the match restarts italy kick-off the second-half .
46. min .
eddie pope gets his second yellow !
the second-half starts in the worst possible way as eddie pope gets his second yellow for a tackle from behind on gilardino .
48. min .
it looks as though both teams failed to cool down at half-time .
the tackles are wild , the atmosphere malevolent and the game is on the brink of boiling over completely .
50. min .
bobby convey comes off ; jimmy conrad on the us make a substitution and directly after carlos bocanegra slams a header against the italian bar ! 53. min .
zaccardo comes off for alessandro del piero the own-goal scorer comes off for the golden boy of italian soccer .
can del piero win the day for ten-man italy over nine-man usa ? 57. min .
claudio reyna advances with menace towards the italy goal with dfeneders backing off .
the us captain has time to get closer but chooses to stab a weak shot at goal from distance which barely makes it to the touchline .
60. min .
dempsey claims zambrotta handles in the area but the claims for a penalty are half-hearted and the ref waves play on .
61. min .
luca toni comes off for iaquinta marcello lippi tries to inject some life into his attack by taking off the ineffective toni .
62. min .
damarcus beasley comes on for clint dempsey 63. min .
mcbride goes close !
brian mcbride steams through onto a great ball from landon donovon but rifles his shot wide of the post with buffon beaten .
64. min .
disallowed goal for united states the referee calls the usa 's second goal offside and kaiserslautern erupts into whistles !
the replays show that mcbride is offside when he back heels the ball past buffon .
67. min .
zambrotta goes close with a wicked curling shot from the edge of the area .
the midfielder drifts past onyewu and curls a fast shot past kasey keller but just past the post as well .
70. min .
zambrotta is the next in the ref 's book the italian forgets that you change shirts at the end of the game as he tustles with landon donovan .
he ends the tugging of the us star 's shirt with a fine shove in the back which earns him a booking .
73. min .
del piero gets on the end of a perfectly weighted chip pass from pirlo to volley goalwards but keller is acrobatic in the save and usa survive a real scare .
78. min .
steve cherundolo beats his man on the right flank with skill and pace before getting a great cross in but brian mcbride is too late in the take-off and heads wide .
79. min .
kasey keller again makes a flying save , this time from andrea pirlo .
the us keeper is earning his corn tonight .
83. min .
the us have people queuing up to take a shot at buffon 's goal but they seem content with the draw .
what other reason could there be for the lack of incisive passes and running when the goal is at their mercy ? 84. min .
pirlo threads the most precise of passes through the us defense to iaquinta who does n't realize he has so much time .
he is alone but pokes a tame shot straight at keller .
87. min .
a great team move involving del piero , pirlo and iaquinta carves open the us defense but when the ball is whipped into the crowded box there is n't an adequate italian boot to apply the finishing touch .
89. min .
gilardino gets on the end of a deep cross but his header flies well wide , much to his frustration .
90 + 2. min .
full-time : a pulsating but bad tempered 1-1 draw the us and italy are deadlocked at the end but this has been no boring drawn match .
both sides gave everything and sacrificed men in the pursuit of the win .
group e remains an interesting prospect : italy have four points , ghana and the czech republic three and the us have one .
no-one is guaranteed a place in the last 16 just yet . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : italy 1:1 usa -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 19.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : italy 1:1 usa review all the action as it happened with dw-world.de 's live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker in-form italy take on the united states in the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern in the next group e game .
the group has been thrown wide open by ghana 's 2-0 win over the czech republic in cologne earlier in the day .
with the czechs , ghanians and the italians all on three points with one win each , a usa win tonight will leave the group in the balance going into the final game on thursday june 22 .
the teams : italy -lrb- 4-3-1-2 -rrb- : 1-gianluigi buffon ; 2-cristian zaccardo , 13-alessandro nesta , 5-fabio cannavaro , 19-gianluca zambrotta ; 4-daniele de rossi , 21-andrea pirlo , 20-simone perrotta ; 10-francesco totti ; 9-luca toni , 11-alberto gilardino .
united states -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 18-kasey keller ; 6-steve cherundolo , 22-oguchi onyewu , 23-eddie pope , 3-carlos bocanegra ; 8-clint dempsey , 10-claudio reyna , 4-pablo mastroeni , 15-bobby convey ; 21-landon donovan , 20-brian mcbride .
coaches make changes for this crucial game italy coach marcello lippi has brought in fit-again defender gianluca zambrotta in place of fabio grosso .
zambrotta missed the 2-0 win over ghana on monday with a thigh injury .
usa coach bruce arena has made two changes from the side which lost 3-0 to the czech republic with carlos bocanegra replacing eddie lewis at left back and clint dempsey slotting in for damarcus beasley on the right side of midfield .
usa looking to harness power of " home " crowd it 's a home game of sorts for the united states as a huge number of service personnel from the nearby us air base at rammstein and their families swell the 52,000 increased capacity at the fritz-walter-stadion in kaiserslautern .
the initimate cauldron-like stadium generates a rousing atmosphere and the two teams will feel that the crowd are right on them as the game progresses .
it is unlikely that the experienced italians will be intimidated , however .
the teams come out onto the pitch italy and the usa enter the stadium on what is a balmy summer evening in kaiserslautern .
recent scorching temperatures have dropped marginally but both teams will certainly feel the heat as the game gets underway .
both teams and sets of supporters conduct themselves well during the anthems ; although what the mother of one fan will make of her son singing the italian anthem in only his lycra boxer shorts is anyone 's guess ...
no place for the fit gennarro gattuso italian coach lippi keeps the combative midfielder from ac milan on the bench for the start although what a weapon to have in your arsenal .
we can expect to see gattuso later if things get tight for the azzurri .
1. min .
kick-off : usa gets the game started the usa gets this crucial group e game underway .
1. min .
bocanegra makes the first clearance but it 's a nervous one which gives italy a throw .
the long throw comes in and luca toni gets a glance on the ball but it goes wide .
3. min .
fabio cannavaro prowls ahead of his back four as italy look to build patiently .
the azzurri will look to break the usa down with their passing game .
4. min .
francesco totti gets the first card 4. min .
the italy striker slides in on clint dempsey and gets the yellow card for the late challenge with barely five minutes on the clock .
6. min .
the usa are giving as hard as they get and the game 's physical nature has come to the fore early as players litter the pitch after a number of fierce challenges .
7. min .
landon donovan goes down in the box as he tries to get on the end of a long cross .
the us crowd want a penalty but donovan appears to have slipped .
9. min .
the usa are growing in confidence as they increase their possession , passing their way intelligently to the edge of the italy box as they look for an opening .
11. min .
if italy are looking to hit the usa on the break they are doing everything right apart from actually getting the ball and breaking !
the whole team except toni is in the italian half waiting to break up the us attacks .
13. min .
the newly returned zambrotta shows the us what danger can come of committed too many men into attack .
he breaks dangerously but is fouled on the elft flank by steve cherundolo .
free-kick .
13. min .
the free-kick is floated in but there is a foul in the box and the ref gives the advantage to the us .
14. min .
the usa breaks and gets a dangerous free-kick right on the edge of the italian box .
15. min .
bobby convey takes the kick but it comes off the wall .
corner-kick .
the ball comes over and is hit back into the box .
convey hovers on the left and picks up the loose ball before hitting a rising shot well over the bar .
a good chance for the us .
18. min .
a great move from the usa carves open the italian defense .
eight passes end in clint dempsey fooling fabio cannavaro and hitting a shot on the turn .
the ball skims just wide of buffon 's goal .
20. min .
eddie pope gets the next card the us defender is the last man as the long ball out of defense comes over .
he has no other choice but to haul down gilardino and is lucky just to get a yellow .
21. min .
goal italy 22. min .
gilardino dives in at the near post to head in italy filled the box waiting for the free-kick but the ball came in early and the milan striker gilardino dived in front of everyone to arrow an unstoppable low header past kasey keller .
you 'd have to say the goal comes against the run of play .
24. min .
the usa will have to show character now .
when they went behind to the czech republic , they had no reply and were taken apart at will .
the italians will be just as ruthless given the chance .
26. min .
goal usa 27. min .
cristian zaccardo scores a bizzare own goal !
the italian defender goes to sweep away the deep cross from convey but he misses the ball completely and diverts the ball past buffon with his standing leg .
28. min .
de rossi gets a straight red ! !
daniele de rossi sees red for a blatant and vicious elbow which leaves brian mcbride with a face covered in blood .
31. min .
with the blood levels up and the pace incessant , luca toni breaks on the left and whips a cross-shot past kasey keller but also past the far post .
32. min .
the usa break and brian mcbride , patched up and back on , is outjumped as the cross comes in .
corner usa .
the ball comes in and dempsey connects well but his header is way over .
35. min .
gattuso comes on for totti gennarro gattuso comes on to shore up the italian midfield .
totti makes way for the milan enforcer .
36. min .
disallowed goal for italy gattuso makes an immediate impression by putting the ball in the net with an exquisite chip but luca toni , not interfering with play and returning from an offside position , is deemed to be offside .
the goal , which looks good in the replays , does n't stand .
40. min .
italy look to soak up pressure and hit gilardino with long balls over the already cautioned eddie pope .
the us look to exploit the sending off of de rossi by piling forward in numbers , swamping the retreating defense .
42. min .
bocanegra shoots !
a great long distance effort from carlos bocanegra dips just over the bar and ends up in the top netting .
it would have been a peach of a goal to take the lead with just before half-time .
43. min .
claudio reyna is the next us player to go close but his shot is deflected behind for a corner .
45. min .
pablo mastroeni gets a straight red !
the us defender is the next one heading for an early bath after a late challenge which completely missed the ball but took andrea pirlo 's ankle .
it 's now ten versus ten .
45 + 3. min .
half-time : a goal apiece ; a red card apiece the us and italy come off the pitch after an incident packed first-half .
45. min .
second-half : the match restarts italy kick-off the second-half .
46. min .
eddie pope gets his second yellow !
the second-half starts in the worst possible way as eddie pope gets his second yellow for a tackle from behind on gilardino .
48. min .
it looks as though both teams failed to cool down at half-time .
the tackles are wild , the atmosphere malevolent and the game is on the brink of boiling over completely .
50. min .
bobby convey comes off ; jimmy conrad on the us make a substitution and directly after carlos bocanegra slams a header against the italian bar ! 53. min .
zaccardo comes off for alessandro del piero the own-goal scorer comes off for the golden boy of italian soccer .
can del piero win the day for ten-man italy over nine-man usa ? 57. min .
claudio reyna advances with menace towards the italy goal with dfeneders backing off .
the us captain has time to get closer but chooses to stab a weak shot at goal from distance which barely makes it to the touchline .
60. min .
dempsey claims zambrotta handles in the area but the claims for a penalty are half-hearted and the ref waves play on .
61. min .
luca toni comes off for iaquinta marcello lippi tries to inject some life into his attack by taking off the ineffective toni .
62. min .
damarcus beasley comes on for clint dempsey 63. min .
mcbride goes close !
brian mcbride steams through onto a great ball from landon donovon but rifles his shot wide of the post with buffon beaten .
64. min .
disallowed goal for united states the referee calls the usa 's second goal offside and kaiserslautern erupts into whistles !
the replays show that mcbride is offside when he back heels the ball past buffon .
67. min .
zambrotta goes close with a wicked curling shot from the edge of the area .
the midfielder drifts past onyewu and curls a fast shot past kasey keller but just past the post as well .
70. min .
zambrotta is the next in the ref 's book the italian forgets that you change shirts at the end of the game as he tustles with landon donovan .
he ends the tugging of the us star 's shirt with a fine shove in the back which earns him a booking .
73. min .
del piero gets on the end of a perfectly weighted chip pass from pirlo to volley goalwards but keller is acrobatic in the save and usa survive a real scare .
78. min .
steve cherundolo beats his man on the right flank with skill and pace before getting a great cross in but brian mcbride is too late in the take-off and heads wide .
79. min .
kasey keller again makes a flying save , this time from andrea pirlo .
the us keeper is earning his corn tonight .
83. min .
the us have people queuing up to take a shot at buffon 's goal but they seem content with the draw .
what other reason could there be for the lack of incisive passes and running when the goal is at their mercy ? 84. min .
pirlo threads the most precise of passes through the us defense to iaquinta who does n't realize he has so much time .
he is alone but pokes a tame shot straight at keller .
87. min .
a great team move involving del piero , pirlo and iaquinta carves open the us defense but when the ball is whipped into the crowded box there is n't an adequate italian boot to apply the finishing touch .
89. min .
gilardino gets on the end of a deep cross but his header flies well wide , much to his frustration .
90 + 2. min .
full-time : a pulsating but bad tempered 1-1 draw the us and italy are deadlocked at the end but this has been no boring drawn match .
both sides gave everything and sacrificed men in the pursuit of the win .
group e remains an interesting prospect : italy have four points , ghana and the czech republic three and the us have one .
no-one is guaranteed a place in the last 16 just yet . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 live ticker : czech republic 0:2 ghana review all the action from the match with dw-world.de 's live ticker . czech starters on the bench the czech republic are facing a number of injury problems before their group e match against ghana .
striker milan baros has yet to make his 2006 world cup premier with heel problems and jan koller , who opened scoring against the us , is out with an injured hamstring .
africa 's first win ?
if ghana are able to top the czech republic it 'd be the first win for an african team at the 2006 world cup .
who 's on the field ?
here 's a look at the starting line-ups : czech republic : -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1- petr cech ; 2- zdenek grygera , 6- marek jankulovski , 22- david rozehnal , 21- tomas ujfalusi ; 4- tomas galasek , 11- pavel nedved , 8- karel poborsky , 10- tomas rosicky , 20- jaroslav plasil ; 12- vratislav lokvenc coach : karel bruckner ghana : -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 22-richard kingson ; 15-john paintsil , 13-habib mohamed , 5-john mensah , 7-shilla illiasu ; 11-sulley muntari , 8-michael essien , 10-stephen appiah , 20-otto addo ; 3-asamoah gyan 14-matthew amoah .
coach : ratomir dujkovic referee : horacio elizondo -lrb- argentina -rrb- the czech fans clearly outnumber the ghana supports in cologne - but the africans make themselves heard during the national anthem .
1. min .
the czechs get the ball rolling .
2. min .
goal ghana ! !
cech had just recovered from a corner kick when asamoah gyan hammered in a ball after ujfalusi misses a clearing header .
3. min .
celebration on the ghana bench - bruckner and the rest of the czech bench look a bit shell shocked .
4. min .
nedved wins a corner after pantsil heads a cross out .
4. min .
jankulovski takes a try from long-range but sends his shot wide of goal .
6. min .
cech sends the ball all the way down the field to kingston in the ghana posts .
7. min .
czechs get into their game after an initial shock , the czech defense has returned to its stable self with grygera distributing passes well .
9. min .
lokvenc , on for injured jan koller , tries to get around a defender , but his lob goes right into kingston 's hands .
10. min .
free kick ghana 10. min .
cech is able to handle the ball into the box without a problem .
11. min .
motivated by an early lead , ghana are pushing forward with all their might whenever they have a chance .
12. min .
rosicky passes off to nedved after beating two defenders , but the shot flies right into kingston 's hands .
14. min .
a set of fouls on both sides have taken the momentum of the match with both sides punctuating drives forward with shots that either go wide or are easily caught .
16. min .
birds of a feather ghana show an initial style similar to the czechs , staying relaxed on defense and looking for a counter opportunity .
18. min .
the ref wants a word with muntari for kicking away a ball .
no card here , just a semi-friendly warning .
19. min .
the card is for otto addo addo is booked for a tough slide tackle on the right side .
21. min .
the ref 's new whistle argentine elizondo is making sure the match does n't get out of his control and calling a close match .
23. min .
nedved and the czech republic do n't look as sure of themselves as they did against the usa .
ghana 's solid defending is keeping the europeans from getting good chances on goal .
24. min .
grygera wants to shake the game up and shoot from long range .
kingson watches the ball fly out without moving .
25. min .
poborsky presses his luck poborsky gets the ball in close the bottom of the penalty area winning some space from the defense , but ca n't beat the second defender on his dribble to the spot .
26. min .
czech republic pack own box the czechs are n't taking any risks and call back all their players to defend a corner .
28. min .
poborsky is pushed outside the ghana area - he wants a card for mensah , but only wins a free kick that does n't bring the czechs closer to goal .
30. min .
czech just wide poborsky takes a square pass from nedved and fires it wide of the far post .
31. min .
amoah misses two chances amoah was just a step behind a pass into the box , missing the volley .
his turn brings him to the center of the goal , but the right-footed shot goes high .
32. min .
cech comes up big against gyan .
gyan broke free of his defender and took the pass from appiah but fired directly into the czech goalie , who was quick off his line .
35. min .
kingson gets beat out coming out of the goal and ca n't his hands on a cross .
nedved 's resulting shot is blocked by mensah .
37. min .
nedved and essien collide near the sideline and ghana 's player is booked for going in with a high boot .
38. min .
cech collects a weak shot from amoah and quickly runs it out to the edge of the box .
he wants his team to get the lead out .
39. min .
ghana getting better of play the czechs look like they 've lost their attacking nature .
they 're running less than the africans and paying for it in shots .
either petr cech has a good eye or he was beat on a appiah shot that missed the goal by mere inches in ghana 's latest chance .
41. min .
gyan lands badly and limps off the field for treatment with only minutes until half-time .
43. min .
rosicky charges in to meet a cross from poborsky , but the volley goes wide of net in the czech 's first good chance of the last few minutes .
45 + 1. min .
czechs missing on offense injuries to baros and koller have taken the bite out of the czech attack .
poborsky and lokvenc are n't able to pick up the slack .
45 + 1. min .
ghana take lead into locker room 45 + 1. min .
the ghana defense is standing well against the czech , and much better than it did against the italians .
on offense they are also creating problems for the czech defense , which is allowing them into the penalty area where the ghanaians shots are n't as lethal as they could be .
45 + 1. min .
when it was clear koller would n't be back in time for the match with ghana , czech republic coach bruckner said the team would have to switch up it plans .
after trailing ghana for nearly all the first half , there are probably some more changes in store for the second half .
46. min .
we 're off in the second half .
46. min .
nedved hammers the ball home only to have the goal called back for offsides .
47. min .
one change each now that the action has slowed down a bit , there were two subs made before the second half kicked off .
jan polak replaced galasek for the czechs , and otto addo came off for derek boateng for ghana .
50. min .
lokvenc booked lokvenc gets his second card of the cup and will be missing during the czech republic-italy game .
the czechs will have to hope one of their other strikers is fit .
51. min .
grygera finds lokvenc on a long ball , but the cross glances of the forward 's head and sails out .
52. min .
gyan takes the ball on kick from goalie kingson , beats three defenders and nearly gets a rocket of a shot past cech , who had to use all his abilities as world goalkeeper of the year to block the shot .
54. min .
gyan is obstructed on his next break through the defense and wins a dangerous free kick .
55. min .
essien sends the ball into the wall , but ghana win it back and continue on the attack .
56. min .
czechs switch up attack poborsky replaced by jiri stajner .
57. min .
kingson saves plasil gets the ball after it floats through the penalty area , striking it on the run , his shot is pushed over the crossbar by kingson .
59. min .
jankulovski is ploughed down by cech but able to continue in the match .
61. min .
ghana are n't holding back aware of how quickly the czechs can switch from defense to dangerous , ghana continue attacking and fighting for every 50-50 ball - though the pace has slowed a bit .
65. min .
penalty ghana ! ! 67. min .
amoah was free in the box had his foot clipped by ujfalusi and elizonda calls for a penalty kick 65. min .
ujfalusi thrown out of the game he 'll miss the next game after tackling amoah .
66. min .
gyan hits the post cech went the other way , but gyan hits the post and the czechs clear .
67. min .
gyan was booked before taking the penalty kick , gyan was given a yellow card for shooting the ball into the goal out of frustration before it was given free .
68. min .
czechs make final switch pasil leaves and libor sionko comes on .
71. min .
cech saves again the czech goalie sprints out and collects the ball with a slide before amoah can add another goal to his tally .
72. min .
led by powerhouse nedved , the czechs are becoming frantic as they see the time tick away .
nedved has just sent another long cross off the field .
75. min .
the ghanaians are encamped in the czech penalty box - the defenders do n't seem interested in marking any of the men and it 's again up to cech to keep his team in the game as amoah fires at him point blank .
75. min .
derek boateng gets booked he played the ball , but rosicky takes a good fall the ref pulls out the yellow card .
76. min .
the free kick goes over the bar .
between crosses into nothingness and being called chronically offsides , the czechs are putting in a poor performance .
78. min .
essien gets free on a run into the box ; his shot does n't have much power behind it and cech clears with his right foot .
79. min .
essien sets gyan free in front of the goal after a taking a long pass but cech comes up big and manages to hold the ball between his legs .
80. min .
matthew amoah out for eric addo .
82. min .
in his first play on the ball eric addo is called for being offside .
82. min .
ghana make it two ! 83. min .
gyan beats the offside trap before passing square to muntari who , finally , hammers a ball past cech .
the keeper did n't have a chance from such close range .
84. min .
muntari booked he will also miss the third game against the usa .
86. min .
change for ghana gyan leaves for razak pimpong .
88. min .
ghana offsides essien is the most recent ghana striker to be called offsides .
the ghanaians are trying to push forward but the czech defense is pulling up in front of them .
90. min .
time is running out for the czechs - three minutes of extra time in cologne .
90 + 1. min .
kingson grabs it in contrast to other keepers up by two goals , he does n't waste any time and tosses the ball out right away .
90 + 3. min .
booking for mohamed on slide tackle from behind .
90 + 3. min .
two last saves from kingson and it 's over kingson keeps his shut-out after saving a free kick from sionko and again from polak .
90 + 3. min .
apparently demoralized after the loss to italy , ghana have returned to top form and are the first african team to claim three points in the 2006 world cup .
90 + 3. min .
group e remains wide open going into today 's final match between italy and the usa .
if the american underdogs pull out a win similar to the ghana 's here in cologne , it would leave all four teams with three points dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

officials positive about world cup security , and fans -pipe- features -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de features -pipe- 17.06.2006 officials positive about world cup security , and fans großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : lots of excitement , few security problems at the tournament so far a senior german security official has expressed satisfaction with the first week of the world cup and forecast that the tournament will remain peaceful .
fan behavior has also come in for praise . so far , the only significant trouble came alongside wednesday 's germany-poland match in dortmund , where 430 people were detained briefly . " it shows that security forces trained just as hard for the world cup as the german national team did , " said jörg ziercke , the head of germany 's federal criminal office , was quoted as telling the daily neue osnabrücker zeitung on saturday , adding he saw no indication of a terrorist threat . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : jörg ziercke , president of germany 's federal criminal office " the police are very watchful and vigorous action is being taken consistently against troublemakers - as on wednesday in dortmund , " he added .
" i am firmly convinced that the games will remain peaceful . " alluding to possible activities by germany 's far right , ziercke said that " we will not meet with tolerance actions of intolerance against the state of law . " a string of attacks on nonwhites in the weeks before the world cup , particularly in germany 's formerly communist east , raised concerns ahead of the tournament .
it unleashed a debate about the existence of " no-go areas " in the east and some groups urged nonwhites to avoid the areas for their own safety . the debate threatened to mar the image germany hopes to project during the tournament , that of an open , tolerant and basically fun-loving society . praise for england another round of praise went to england 's fans , who are often the pariahs of international soccer due their reputation for hooliganism . this time , according to wolfgang niersbach , vice-president of the german organizing committee , the behaviour of england 's supporters has been one of the hightlights of the four-week tournament . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : english fans " by our estimates , there were 60,000 or 70,000 english fans in nuremberg for the match against trinidad & tobago and their exemplary behaviour was being discussed by many people , " he told reporters at fifa 's daily news briefing on friday . during the thursday game in nuremberg , only 26 england fans were detained by police before and after england 's 2-0 win . kevin miles , international coordinator for the -lrb- english -rrb- football supporters federation , told reuters his group has always maintained that the majority of england fans behave well for the majority of the time . " i am delighted to hear that excellent behaviour of england fans has been recognized by the authorities , " he said . niersbach also applauded the conduct of swedish fans in berlin for thursday 's match against paraguay , and the fact that many germans put on sweden 's yellow shirts in support of the scandinavians . " the atmosphere at the stadiums was incredible , " he said .
" the fans are behaving so well , long may it continue . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de international cops arrive to boost security for world cup germany has left little to chance in its preparations to host the soccer world cup .
police officers from 13 nations have arrived in the country to help identify and rein in potential troublemakers .
-lrb- june 7 , 2006 -rrb- german interior minister : " people will feel safe " in an interview with dw-tv , german interior and sports minister wolfgang schäuble said that all measures had been taken to ensure that the biggest event in germany 's modern history will be safe .
-lrb- june 3 , 2006 -rrb- hooligan violence rears its head for germany-poland game even as millions in germany celebrated their team 's hard-earned win over poland , police in dortmund , the game 's venue , had their hands full after german and polish fans clashed there .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- 9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures interviews the stars have their say world cup stars talk to dw-world.de about the tournament .

fan behavior has also come in for praise . so far , the only significant trouble came alongside wednesday 's germany-poland match in dortmund , where 430 people were detained briefly . " it shows that security forces trained just as hard for the world cup as the german national team did , " said jörg ziercke , the head of germany 's federal criminal office , was quoted as telling the daily neue osnabrücker zeitung on saturday , adding he saw no indication of a terrorist threat . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : jörg ziercke , president of germany 's federal criminal office " the police are very watchful and vigorous action is being taken consistently against troublemakers - as on wednesday in dortmund , " he added .
" i am firmly convinced that the games will remain peaceful . " alluding to possible activities by germany 's far right , ziercke said that " we will not meet with tolerance actions of intolerance against the state of law . " a string of attacks on nonwhites in the weeks before the world cup , particularly in germany 's formerly communist east , raised concerns ahead of the tournament .
it unleashed a debate about the existence of " no-go areas " in the east and some groups urged nonwhites to avoid the areas for their own safety . the debate threatened to mar the image germany hopes to project during the tournament , that of an open , tolerant and basically fun-loving society . praise for england another round of praise went to england 's fans , who are often the pariahs of international soccer due their reputation for hooliganism . this time , according to wolfgang niersbach , vice-president of the german organizing committee , the behaviour of england 's supporters has been one of the hightlights of the four-week tournament . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : english fans " by our estimates , there were 60,000 or 70,000 english fans in nuremberg for the match against trinidad & tobago and their exemplary behaviour was being discussed by many people , " he told reporters at fifa 's daily news briefing on friday . during the thursday game in nuremberg , only 26 england fans were detained by police before and after england 's 2-0 win . kevin miles , international coordinator for the -lrb- english -rrb- football supporters federation , told reuters his group has always maintained that the majority of england fans behave well for the majority of the time . " i am delighted to hear that excellent behaviour of england fans has been recognized by the authorities , " he said . niersbach also applauded the conduct of swedish fans in berlin for thursday 's match against paraguay , and the fact that many germans put on sweden 's yellow shirts in support of the scandinavians . " the atmosphere at the stadiums was incredible , " he said .
" the fans are behaving so well , long may it continue . " dw staff -lrb- jam -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de international cops arrive to boost security for world cup germany has left little to chance in its preparations to host the soccer world cup .

three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 14.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : the road to the final two late extra-time goals kill off germany 's world cup dream zidane 's penalty decides nervous semi as france make final italy make light work of ukraine to meet hosts in semi-finals us out of world cup while ghana , italy reach next round match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : no quarter : both italy and the united states gave everything in the battle of nuremberg in terms of goals , italy and the us canceled each other out .
in terms of sendings-off ; italy won , having only one man dismissed to usa 's two .
in between the goals and the cards , everything else possible happened . italy were held to a 1-1 draw by the usa in a bad-tempered world cup clash here saturday in which three players were sent off . the result means that all four teams in group e , which also includes ghana and the czech republic , still have a chance of making the last 16 . alberto gilardino gave italy the lead with a diving header , but an own goal by cristian zaccardo brought the usa back on level terms . us striker eddie johnson had caused a rumpus earlier in the week by comparing the world cup to war .
it was n't warfare , but this gripping contest was far from friendly . three-time world champions italy had daniele de rossi sent off in the 28th minute for elbowing brian mcbride and the usa 's pablo mastroeni shortly followed him down the tunnel for clattering into andrea pirlo . the americans were then reduced to nine men a minute after half time when eddie pope picked up his second yellow card .
it was only the fourth time in the history of the world cup that three players had been sent off in the same match . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pope 's second yellow meant usa finished with nine men kasey keller pulled off two excellent saves to deny italy substitute alessandro del piero in the closing stages as the usa bravely dug in to snatch a point . the result leaves the group wide open going into the final first round match with italy on four points , followed by the czech republic and ghana both on three and the usa on one . italy next face the czech republic in hamburg next thursday , while the usa take on ghana in nuremberg the same day . the americans , quarter-finalists four years ago , made life difficult for the italians in the first quarter of an hour , snapping into tackles and creating two half chances which bobby convey and dempsey wasted . italy absorbed the pressure and took the lead in the 22nd minute after pope 's foul on luca toni wide on the right . pirlo delivered a low centre into the box and gilardino stooped to steer the ball past a helpless keller with his forehead . italy 's joy lasted just five minutes with a defensive howler gifting the usa an equalizer . zaccardo swung a boot out wildly to try and clear convey 's crossed free-kick and succeeded only in diverting the ball past his own keeper , gianluigi buffon . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : brian mcbride recovered to threaten for the us in attack worse was to follow seconds later as de rossi was rightly sent off for elbowing mcbride in the face .
mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : italy 1:1 usa www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback who do you think will progress from group e ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

on track portugal meet embattled iran -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 02.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 on track portugal meet embattled iran großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal will be taking the iranian challenge seriously struggling to stay on in the tournament and missing captain and top-scorer ali daei , beleaguered iran face portugal in the group d match in frankfurt on saturday . iran 's world cup chances took another blow this week when it emerged that captain and veteran top goal getter ali daei will miss the match against portugal on saturday with a back problem . " he suffered a hit in the back during yesterday 's game and probably wo n't be fit to play against portugal , " iran 's coach branko ivankovic said monday after his team 's 3-1 defeat to mexico . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ali daei is set to miss the match against portugal daei , who once played for bayern munich and holds the world record for international goals , with 109 - more than both pele and ferenc puskas - is just the latest in iran 's contingent of bundesliga players to be hit by injury . mehdi mahdavikia and vahid hashemian were both recovering from knocks as they labored against mexico on sunday while bayern munich 's ali karimi had to be sent off after struggling for 55 minutes against mexico .
ferydoon zandi did not even make the bench . " we had some problems in the last two or three months .
karimi was playing his second game in three months , hashemian was out injured for two months and mahdavikia could n't practice for the last 10 days , " ivankovic said . " a terrible mistake " a sports professor who recently coached hanover in germany 's second division and led the iranian under-23 team to victory at the asian games four years ago , ivankovic has come under fire for iran 's performance against mexico , which has diminished iranian fans ' hopes of repeating the country 's one world cup success to date - a 2-1 win over the united states in 1998 . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : iran 's rahman rezei , left , heads the ball past mexico 's jared borgetti ivankovic was livid after defender rahman rezaei , whose leaping header had set up iran 's equalizer on sunday , allowed himself to be robbed on the edge of the penalty box for mexico to go up 2-1 . iran are now third in group d and have little chance of making the knock-out stages with games to come against portugal and angola . " we had a chance to do something today , we played very well especially in the first half and maybe we could have scored more than one goal , " ivankovic said after the defeat to mexico .
" we lost a goal through a terrible mistake in the defensive line , and of course after that it was much harder . " " a difficult game " portugal , however , is taking iran very seriously despite their 1-0 win over their first group d opponents angola . " it will be a difficult game .
we saw the first half against mexico and we saw iran playing very well , " portugal midfielder costinha said this week .
" they lost the first game so in this game they will play even harder because if they lose , it will be difficult for them to qualify , " costinha said , adding that the mexicans would be particularly watchful about strong midfield attacks from iran . but portugal suffered a mild shock this week when star winger christiano ronaldo , who plays for manchester united , left a practice session early , after complaining about his right hamstring .
portuguese soccer officials insisted that ronaldo was merely tired . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's luis figo , left , and angola 's andre challenge for the ball but the portuguese can still count on a star line-up with deco - counted among the world 's best midfielders and nicknamed " the magic one " for his deadly free kicks and long passes - and captain luis figo , the two most experienced members of the team . figo , who turns 34 in november , proved his worth when he orchestrated the 1-0 win over angola by breaking through the defense to set up pauleta 's goal . portugal has its sights trained high for the world cup .
coach luiz felipe scolari , who won the last world cup with brazil , said ahead of the tournament he had no doubts that the trophy is within portugal 's reach . dw staff -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup team checks : portugal while one of europe 's most attacking and flamboyant sides , portugal has failed to make an impact on the world stage .
the euro 2004 runners-up will be hoping to put that right on european soil this summer .
-lrb- march 18 , 2006 -rrb- world cup team checks : iran iranian soccer stars are becoming high profile with many securing big moves into europe and enjoying success there .
the national team is also getting itself a reputation as an up-and-coming side .
-lrb- march 18 , 2006 -rrb- mexico down iran with two goals in three minutes mexico and iran arrived in nuremberg for their first match knowing that they had a chance of progressing in a relatively weak group , but after 90 minutes iran were left wondering how their tournament would end .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

in between the goals and the cards , everything else possible happened . italy were held to a 1-1 draw by the usa in a bad-tempered world cup clash here saturday in which three players were sent off . the result means that all four teams in group e , which also includes ghana and the czech republic , still have a chance of making the last 16 . alberto gilardino gave italy the lead with a diving header , but an own goal by cristian zaccardo brought the usa back on level terms . us striker eddie johnson had caused a rumpus earlier in the week by comparing the world cup to war .
it was n't warfare , but this gripping contest was far from friendly . three-time world champions italy had daniele de rossi sent off in the 28th minute for elbowing brian mcbride and the usa 's pablo mastroeni shortly followed him down the tunnel for clattering into andrea pirlo . the americans were then reduced to nine men a minute after half time when eddie pope picked up his second yellow card .
it was only the fourth time in the history of the world cup that three players had been sent off in the same match . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pope 's second yellow meant usa finished with nine men kasey keller pulled off two excellent saves to deny italy substitute alessandro del piero in the closing stages as the usa bravely dug in to snatch a point . the result leaves the group wide open going into the final first round match with italy on four points , followed by the czech republic and ghana both on three and the usa on one . italy next face the czech republic in hamburg next thursday , while the usa take on ghana in nuremberg the same day . the americans , quarter-finalists four years ago , made life difficult for the italians in the first quarter of an hour , snapping into tackles and creating two half chances which bobby convey and dempsey wasted . italy absorbed the pressure and took the lead in the 22nd minute after pope 's foul on luca toni wide on the right . pirlo delivered a low centre into the box and gilardino stooped to steer the ball past a helpless keller with his forehead . italy 's joy lasted just five minutes with a defensive howler gifting the usa an equalizer . zaccardo swung a boot out wildly to try and clear convey 's crossed free-kick and succeeded only in diverting the ball past his own keeper , gianluigi buffon . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : brian mcbride recovered to threaten for the us in attack worse was to follow seconds later as de rossi was rightly sent off for elbowing mcbride in the face .
mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : italy 1:1 usa www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback who do you think will progress from group e ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 17.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 13.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : the road to the final two late extra-time goals kill off germany 's world cup dream zidane 's penalty decides nervous semi as france make final italy make light work of ukraine to meet hosts in semi-finals us out of world cup while ghana , italy reach next round match reports -pipe- 17.06.2006 three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : no quarter : both italy and the united states gave everything in the battle of nuremberg in terms of goals , italy and the us canceled each other out .
in terms of sendings-off ; italy won , having only one man dismissed to usa 's two .
in between the goals and the cards , everything else possible happened . italy were held to a 1-1 draw by the usa in a bad-tempered world cup clash here saturday in which three players were sent off . the result means that all four teams in group e , which also includes ghana and the czech republic , still have a chance of making the last 16 . alberto gilardino gave italy the lead with a diving header , but an own goal by cristian zaccardo brought the usa back on level terms . us striker eddie johnson had caused a rumpus earlier in the week by comparing the world cup to war .
it was n't warfare , but this gripping contest was far from friendly . three-time world champions italy had daniele de rossi sent off in the 28th minute for elbowing brian mcbride and the usa 's pablo mastroeni shortly followed him down the tunnel for clattering into andrea pirlo . the americans were then reduced to nine men a minute after half time when eddie pope picked up his second yellow card .
it was only the fourth time in the history of the world cup that three players had been sent off in the same match . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pope 's second yellow meant usa finished with nine men kasey keller pulled off two excellent saves to deny italy substitute alessandro del piero in the closing stages as the usa bravely dug in to snatch a point . the result leaves the group wide open going into the final first round match with italy on four points , followed by the czech republic and ghana both on three and the usa on one . italy next face the czech republic in hamburg next thursday , while the usa take on ghana in nuremberg the same day . the americans , quarter-finalists four years ago , made life difficult for the italians in the first quarter of an hour , snapping into tackles and creating two half chances which bobby convey and dempsey wasted . italy absorbed the pressure and took the lead in the 22nd minute after pope 's foul on luca toni wide on the right . pirlo delivered a low centre into the box and gilardino stooped to steer the ball past a helpless keller with his forehead . italy 's joy lasted just five minutes with a defensive howler gifting the usa an equalizer . zaccardo swung a boot out wildly to try and clear convey 's crossed free-kick and succeeded only in diverting the ball past his own keeper , gianluigi buffon . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : brian mcbride recovered to threaten for the us in attack worse was to follow seconds later as de rossi was rightly sent off for elbowing mcbride in the face .
mcbride 's face was dripping with blood as de rossi headed down the tunnel with his head hung low . despite their numerical disadvantage , italy almost restored their lead but toni shot wide after sprinting clear of the usa defense . mastroeni then joined de rossi for an early bath following a late lunge on pirlo . pope lasted just 60 seconds of the second-half before the usa 's carlos bocanegra headed against his own bar . mcbride should have hit the target after being put clear by landon donovan and gianluca zambrotta drove wide for italy as play swung from end to end . del piero 's introduction lifted italy , but the two chances that fell his way were superbly stopped by keller . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de team usa takes on mighty azzuri in group e clash the united states will face italy in a world cup group e match in kaiserslautern on saturday and will be hoping to avoid a repeat of their crushing 0-3 defeat in the opener .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- impressive czechs beat defiant us 3-0 the first game in group e , considered one of the tougher ones , was a one-sided affair as the czech republic showed a great example of tactically well played soccer .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- italy rock and roll their way to victory over ghana italy began their world cup campaign with a 2-0 victory over ghana in hanover on monday .
there was a new attacking flair to the azzurri but the old habit of play-acting was still in evidence with plenty of theatrics .
-lrb- june 13 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : italy 1:1 usa www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
